editorialDecl.p: I have not included Patwardhan’s notes in this version.

Patwardhan’s edition includes an appendix which contains a number of additional verses that are only found in one manuscript (C). He assigns them hyphenated numbers representing their place in his edition (e.g. 652-1, the first additional verse after verse 652). They are found in an appendix in this file.

lg.l: savvannuvayaṇapaṅkayaṇivāsiṇiṁ paṇamiūṇa suyadēviṁ ।
dhammāitivaggajuyaṁ suyaṇāṇa suhāsiyaṁ vōcchaṁ ॥ 1 ॥
amayaṁ pāiyakavvaṁ paḍhiuṁ sōuṁ ca jē na jāṇanti ।
kāmassa tattavatiṁ kuṇanti tē kaha na lajjanti ॥ 2 ॥
vivihakaïviraïyāṇaṁ gāhāṇaṁ varakulāṇi ghēttūṇa ।
raïyaṁ vajjālaggaṁ vihiṇā jayavallahaṁ nāma ॥ 3 ॥
ēkkatthē patthāvē jattha paḍhijjanti paüragāhāō ।
taṁ khalu vajjālaggaṁ vajja tti ya paddhaī bhaṇiyā ॥ 4 ॥
ēyaṁ vajjālaggaṁ savvaṁ jō paḍhaï avasarammi sayā ।
pāiyakavvakaī sō hōhii taha kittimantō ya ॥ 5 ॥
dukkhaṁ kīraï kavvaṁ kavbammi kaē paüñjaṇā dukkhaṁ ।
santē paüñjamāṇē sōyārā dullahā hunti ॥ 1 ॥
sakkayamasakkayaṁ pi hu atthō sōyārasaṅgamavasēṇa ।
appuvvarasavisēsaṁ jaṇēi jaṁ taṁ mahacchariyaṁ ॥ 2 ॥
muttāhalaṁ va kavvaṁ sahāvavimalaṁ suvaṇṇasaṅghaḍiyaṁ ।
sōyārakaṇṇakuhararammi payaḍiyaṁ pāyaḍaṁ hōi ॥ 3 ॥
addhakkharabhaṇiyāiṁ nūṇaṁ savilāsamuddhahasiyāiṁ ।
addhacchipēcchiyāiṁ gāhāhi viṇā na najjanti ॥ 1 ॥
sālaṅkarāhi salakkhaṇāhi annannarāyarasiyāhiṁ ।
gāhāhi paṇaïṇīhi ya khijjaï cittaṁ aïntīhiṁ ॥ 2 ॥
ēyaṁ ciya navari phuḍaṁ hiyayaṁ gāhāṇa mahiliyāṇaṁ ca ।
aṇarasiēhi na labbhaï daviṇaṁ va vihīṇapuṇṇēhiṁ ॥ 3 ॥
sacchandiyā sarūvā sālaṅkārā ya sarasa--ullāvā ।
varakāmiṇi vva gāhā gāhijjantī rasaṁ dēi ॥ 4 ॥
gāhāṇa rasā mahilāṇa vibbhamā kaïjaṇāṇa ullāvā ।
kassaṁ na haranti hiyayaṁ bālāṇa ya mammaṇullāvā ॥ 5 ॥
savvō gāhāu jaṇō vīsatthō bhaṇaï savvagōṭhṭhīsu ।
paramatthō jō tāṇaṁ sō nāō mahachaïllēhiṁ ॥ 6 ॥
gāhā ruaï varāī sikkijjantī gavāralōēhiṁ ।
kīraï luñcapaluñcā jaha gāī mandadōhēhiṁ ॥ 7 ॥
gāhē bhajjihisi tumaṁ ahavā lahuyattaṇaṁ vi pāvihisi ।
gāmāradantadiḍhakaḍhiṇapīḍiyā ucchulaṭṭhi vva ॥ 8 ॥
gāhāṇaṁ gīyāṇaṁ tantīsaddāṇa pōḍhamahilāṇaṁ ।
tāṇaṁ ciya sō daṇḍō jē tāṇa rasaṁ na yāṇanti ॥ 9 ॥
chandaṁ ayāṇa māṇēhi jā kiyā sā na hōi ramaṇijjā ।
kiṁ gāhā aha sēvā ahavā gāhā vi sēvā vi ॥ 10 ॥
cintāmandaramanthāṇamanthiē vittharammi atthāhē ।
uppajjanti kaīhiyayasāyarē kavvarayaṇāiṁ ॥ 1 ॥
rayaṇujjalapayasōhaṁ taṁ kavvaṁ jaṁ tavēi paḍivakkhaṁ ।
purisāyantavilāsiṇirasaṇādāmaṁ miva rasantaṁ ॥ 2 ॥
pāiyakavvammi rasō jō jāyaï taha ya chēyamaṇiēhiṁ ।
uyayasya ya vāsiyasīyalassa tittiṁ na vaccāmō ॥ 3 ॥
kaha kaha vi raēi payaṁ maggaṁ pulaēi chēyamāruhaï ।
cōrō vva kaī atthaṁ ghēttūṇaṁ kaha vi nivvahaï ॥ 4 ॥
saddāvasaddabhīrū paē paē kiṁ pi kiṁ pi cintantō ।
dukkhōhi kaha vi pāvaï cōrō atthaṁ kaī kavvaṁ ॥ 5 ॥
saddapalōṭṭaṁ dōsēhi vajjiyaṁ sulaliyaṁ phuḍaṁ mahuraṁ
puṇṇēhi kaha vi pāvaï chandē kavvaṁ kalattaṁ ca ॥ 6 ॥
aṇavarayabahalarōmañcakañcuyaṁ jaṇiyajaṇamaṇāṇandaṁ ।
jaṁ na dhuṇāvaï sīsaṁ kavvaṁ pēmmaṁ ca kiṁ tēṇa ॥ 7 ॥
sō sōhaï dūsantō kaïyaṇaraïyāi vivihakavvāiṁ ।
jō bhañjiūṇa avayaṁ1 annapayaṁ sundaraṁ dēi ॥ 8 ॥
atthakkō rasarahiō dēsavihīṇō'ṇuṇāsiō turiō ।
muhavañcaṇō virāō ēē dōsā paḍhantassa ॥ 9 ॥
dēsiyasaddapalōdr̥ṁ mahurakkharachandasaṇṭhiyaṁ laliyaṁ ।
phuḍaviyaḍapāyaḍatthaṁ pāiyakavvaṁ paḍhēyavvaṁ ॥ 10 ॥
laliē mahurakkharaē juvaījaṇavallahē sasiṅgārē ।
santē pāiyakavvē kō sakkaï sakkayaṁ paḍhiuṁ ॥ 11 ॥
abuhā buhāṇa majjhē paḍhanti jē chandalakkhaṇavihūṇā ।
tē bhamuhākhaggaṇivāḍiyaṁ pi sīsaṁ na lakkhanti ॥ 12 ॥
pāiyakavvassa namō pāiyakavvaṁ ca nimmiyaṁ jēṇa ।
tāhaṁ ciya paṇamāmō paḍhiūṇa ya jē vi thāṇanti ॥13 ॥
mahaṇammi sasī mahaṇammi suratarū mahaṇasambhavā lacchī ।
suyaṇō uṇa kahasu mahaṁ na yāṇimō kattha sambhūō ॥ 1 ॥
suyaṇō suddhasahāvō maïlijjantō vi dujjaṇajaṇēṇa ।
chārēṇa dappaṇō viya ahiyayaraṁ nimmalō hōi ॥ 2 ॥
suyaṇō na kuppaï cciya aha kuppaï maṅgulaṁ na cintēi ।
aha cintēi na jampaï aha jampaï lajjirō hōi ॥ 3 ॥
daḍharōsakalusiyassa vi suyaṇassa suhāu vippiyaṁ kattō ।
rāhumuhammi vi sasiṇō kiraṇā amayaṁ ciya muyanti ॥ 4 ॥
diṭṭhā haranti dukkhaṁ jampantā dēnti sayalasōkkhāiṁ ।
ēyaṁ vihiṇā sukayaṁ suyaṇā jaṁ nimmiyā bhuvaṇē ॥ 5 ॥
na hasanti paraṁ na thuvanti appayaṁ piyasayāi jampanti ।
ēsō suyaṇasahāvō namō namō tāṇa purisāṇaṁ ॥ 6 ॥
akaē vi kaē vi piē piyaṁ kuṇantā jayammi dīsanti ।
kayavippiē vi hu piyaṁ kuṇanti tē dullahā suyaṇā ॥ 7 ॥
savvassa ēha payaī piyammi uppāiē piyaṁ kāuṁ ।
suyaṇassa ēha payaī akaē vi piē piyaṁ kāuṁ ॥ 8 ॥
pharusaṁ na bhaṇasi bhaṇiō vi hasasi hasiūṇa jampasi piyāiṁ ।
sajjaṇa tujjha sahāvō na yāṇimō kassa sāricchō ॥ 9 ॥
nēcchasi parāvayāraṁ parōvayāraṁ ca niccamāvahasi ।
avarāhēhi1 na kuppasi suyaṇa namō tuha sahāvassa ॥ 10 ॥
dōhiṁ ciya pajjattaṁ bahuēhi vi kiṁ guṇōhi suyaṇassa ।
vijjupphuriyaṁ2 rōsō mittī pāhāṇarēha vva ॥ 11 ॥
rē rē kalikālamahāgaïnda galagajjiyassa kō kālō ।
ajja vi supurisakēsarikisōracalaṇaṅkiyā puhavī ॥ 12 ॥
dīṇaṁ abbhuddhariuṁ pattē saraṇāgaē piyaṁ kāuṁ ।
avaraddhēsu vi khamiuṁ suyaṇō cciya navari jāṇēi ॥ 13 ॥
vē purisā dharaï dharā ahavā dōhiṁ pi dhāriyā dharaṇī ।
uvayārē jassa maī uvayariyaṁ jō na pamhusaï ॥ 14 ॥
paḍivajjanti na suyaṇā aha paḍivajjanti kaha vi dukkhēhiṁ ।
patthararēha vva samā maraṇō vi na annahā hōi ॥ 15 ॥
sēlā calanti palaē majjāyaṁ sāyarā vi mēllanti ।
suyaṇā tahiṁ pi kālē paḍivannaṁ nēya siḍhilanti ॥ 16 ॥
candaṇataru vva suyaṇā phalarahiyā jaï vi nimmiyā vihiṇā ।
taha vi kuṇanti paratthaṁ niyayasarīrēṇa lōyassa ॥ 17 ॥
hayadujjaṇassa vayaṇaṁ nirantaraṁ bahalakajjalacchāyaṁ ।
saṅkuddhaṁ bhiuḍijuyaṁ kayā vi na hu nimmalaṁ diṭṭhaṁ ॥ 1 ॥
thaddhō vaṅkaggīvō avañciō visamadiṭṭhiduppēcchō ।
ahiṇavariddhi vva khalō sūlādinnu1 vva paḍihāi ॥ 2 ॥
nahamāsabhēyajaṇaṇō dummuhaō atthikhaṇḍaṇasamatthō ।
taha vi hu majjhāvaliō namaha khalō naharaṇasaricchō ॥ 3 ॥
akulīṇō dōmuhaō tā mahurō bhōyaṇaṁ muhē jāva ।
muraü vva khalō jiṇṇāmmi bhōyaṇē virasamārasaï ॥ 4 ॥
niddhammō guṇarahiō ṭhāṇavimukkō ya lōhasambhūō ।
vindhaï jaṇassa hiyayaṁ pisuṇō bāṇu vva laggantō ॥ 5 ॥
jammē vi jaṁ na hūyaṁ na hu hōsaï jaṁ ca jammala kkhē vi ।
taṁ jampanti taha cciya pisuṇā jaha hōi sāricchaṁ ॥ 6 ॥
guṇiṇō guṇēhi vihavēhi vihaviṇō hōntu gavviyā nāma ।
dōsēhi navari gavvō khalāṇa maggō cciya aüvvō ॥ 7 ॥
santaṁ na dēnti vārēnti dēntayaṁ dinnayaṁ pi hāranti ।
aṇimittavaïriyāṇaṁ khalāṇa maggō cciya aüvvō ॥ 8 ॥
paravivaraladdhalakkhē cittalaē bhīsaṇē jamalajīhē ।
vaṅkaparisakkirē gōṇasē vva pisuṇē suhaṁ kattō ॥ 9 ॥
asamatthamantatantāṇa kulavimukkāṇa mōyahīṇāṇaṁ ।
diṭṭhāṇa kō na bīhaï vintarasappāṇa va khalāṇaṁ ॥ 10 ॥
ēyaṁ ciya bahulāhō jīvijjaï jaṁ khalāṇa majjhammi ।
lāhō jaṁ na ḍasijjaï bhuyaṅgaparivēḍhiē calaṇē ॥ 11 ॥
na sahaï abbhatthaṇiyaṁ asaï gayāṇaṁ pi piṭṭhimaṁsāiṁ ।
daṭṭhūṇa bhāsuramuhaṁ khalasīhaṁ kō na bīhēi ॥ 12 ॥
mā vaccaï vīsambhaṁ pamuhē bahukūḍakavaḍabhariyāṇaṁ ।
nivvattiya kajjaparaṁmuhāṇa suṇayāṇa va khalāṇaṁ ॥ 13 ॥
jēhiṁ ciya ubbhaviyā jāṇa pasāēṇa niggayapayāvā ।
samarā ḍahanti viñjhaṁ khalāṇa maggō cciya aüvvō ॥ 14 ॥
sarasā vi dumā dāvāṇalēṇa ḍajjhanti sukkhasaṁvaliyā ।
dujjaṇasaṅgē pattē suyaṇō vi suhaṁ na pāvēi ॥ 15 ॥
khalasajjaṇāṇa dōsā guṇā ya kō vaṇṇiuṁ taraï lōē ।
jaï navari nāyarāō dōhiṁ jīhāsahassēhiṁ ॥ 16 ॥
ēkkaṁ ciya salahijjaï diṇēsadiyahāṇa navari nivvahaṇaṁ ।
ājamma ēkkamēkkēhi jēhi virahō cciya na diṭṭhō ॥ 1 ॥
paḍivannaṁ diṇayaravāsarāṇa dōṇhaṁ akhaṇḍiyaṁ suhaï ।
sūrō na diṇēṇa viṇā diṇō vi na hu suravirahammi ॥ 2 ॥
mittaṁ payatōyasamaṁ sāricchaṁ jaṁ na hōi kiṁ tēṇa ।
ahiyāēi milantaṁ āvaï āvaṭṭaē paḍhamaṁ ॥ 3 ॥
taṁ mittaṁ kāyavvaṁ jaṁ kira vasaṇammi dēsakālammi ।
ālihiyamittibāullayaṁ va na paraṁmuhaṁ ṭhāi ॥ 4 ॥
taṁ mittaṁ kāyavvaṁ jaṁ mittaṁ kālakambalīsarisaṁ ।
uyaēṇa dhōyamāṇaṁ sahāvaraṅgaṁ na mēllēi ॥ 5 ॥
saguṇāṇa nigguṇāṇa ya garuyā pālanti jaṁ ji paḍivannaṁ ।
pēcchaha vasahēṇa samaṁ harēṇa vōlāviō appā ॥ 6 ॥
chijjaü sīsaṁ aha hōu bandhaṇaṁ cayaü savvahā lacchī ।
paḍivannapālaṇē supurisāṇa jaṁ hōi taṁ hōu ॥ 7 ॥
diḍhalōhasaṅkalāṇaṁ annāṇa vi vivihapāsabandhāṇaṁ ।
tāṇaṁ ciya ahiyayaraṁ vāyābandhaṁ kulīṇassa ॥ 8 ॥
candō dhavalijjaï puṇṇimāi aha puṇṇimā vi candēṇa ।
samasuhadukkhāi maṇē puṇṇēṇa viṇā na labbhanti ॥ 1 ॥
ēkkāi navari nēhō payāsiō tihuyaṇammi jōṇhāē ।
jā jhijjaï jhīṇē sasaharammi vaḍḍhēi vaḍḍhantē ॥ 2 ॥
jhijjaï jhīṇammi sayā vaḍḍhaï vaḍḍhantayammi savisēsaṁ ।
sāyarasasīṇa chajjaï jayammi paḍivannaṇivvahaṇaṁ ॥ 3 ॥
paḍivannaṁ jēṇa samaṁ puvvaṇiōēṇa hōi jīvassa ।
dūraṭiṭhaō na dūrē jaha candō kumuyasaṇḍāṇaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
dūraṭiṭhayā na dūrē sajjaṇacittāṇa puvvamiliyāṇaṁ ।
gayaṇaṭriṭhaō vi candō āsāsaï kumuyasaṇḍāiṁ ॥ 5 ॥
diṭṭhē vi hu hōi suhaṁ jaï vi na pāvanti aṅgasaṅgāiṁ ।
dūraṭṭhiō vi candō suṇivvuiṁ kuṇaï kumuyāṇaṁ ॥ 6 ॥
ēmēva kaha vi kassa vi kēṇa vi diṭṭhēṇa hōi pariōsō ।
kamalāyarāṇa raïṇā kiṁ kajjaṁ jēṇa viyasanti ॥ 7 ॥
kattō uggamaï raī kattō viyasanti paṅkayavaṇāiṁ ।
suyaṇāṇa jaē nēhō na calaï dūraṭṭhiyāṇaṁ pi ॥ 8 ॥
jaṁ jassa mammamēyaṁ cālijjantaṁ ca dūmaē hiyayaṁ ।
taṁ tassa kaṇṇakaḍuyaṁ kulēsu jāyā na japāta ॥ 1 ॥
santēha asantēhi ya parassa kiṁ jampiēhi dōsēhiṁ ॥
atthō jasō na labbhaï sō vi amittō kaō hōi ॥ 2 ॥
appahiyaṁ kāyavvaṁ jaï sakkaï parahiyaṁ ca kāyavvaṁ ।
appahiyaparahiyāṇaṁ appahiyaṁ cēva kāyavvaṁ ॥ 3 ॥
purisē saccasamiddhē aliyapamukkē sahāvasantuṭṭhē ।
tavadhammaṇiyamamaïē visamā vi dasā samā hōi ॥ 4 ॥
sīlaṁ varaṁ kulāō dāliddaṁ bhavvayaṁ ca rōgāō ।
vijjā rajjāu varaṁ khamā varaṁ suṭṭhu vi tavāō ॥ 5 ॥
sīlaṁ varaṁ kulāō kulēṇa kiṁ hōi vigayasīlēṇa ।
kamalāi kaddamē sambhavanti na hu hunti maliṇāiṁ ॥ 6 ॥
jaṁ ji khamēi samatthō ghaṇavantō jaṁ na gavvamuvvahaï ।
jaṁ ca savijjō namirō tisu tēsu alaṅkiyā puhabī ॥ 7 ॥
chandaṁ jō aṇuvaṭṭaï mammaṁ rakkhaï guṇē payāsēi ।
sō navari māṇusāṇaṁ dēvāṇa vi vallahō hōi ॥ 8 ॥
chaṇavañcaṇēṇa varisō nāsaï divasō kubhōyaṇē bhuttē ।
kukalattēṇa ya jammō nāsaï dhammō ahammēṇa ॥ 9 ॥
channaṁ dhammaṁ payaḍaṁ ca pōrisaṁ parakalattavañcaṇayaṁ ।
gañjaṇarahiō jammō rāḍhāittāṇa sampaḍaï ॥ 10 ॥
appāṇaṁ amuyantā jē ārambhanti duggamaṁ kajjaṁ ।
paramuhapalōiyāṇaṁ tāṇaṁ kaha hōi jayalacchī ॥ 1 ॥
sigdhaṁ āruha kajjaṁ pāraddhaṁ mā kahaṁ pi siḍhilēsu ।
pāraddhasiḍhiliyāiṁ kajjāi puṇō na sijjhanti ॥ 2 ॥
acchaü tā iyarajaṇō aṅgē cciya jāi pañca bhūyāiṁ ।
tāhaṁ ciya lajjijjaï pāraddhaṁ pariharantēṇa ॥ 3 ॥
jhīṇavihavō vi suyaṇō sēvaï rannaṁ na patthaē annaṁ ।
maraṇē vi aïmahagdhaṁ na vikkiṇaï māṇamāṇikkaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
vē maggā bhuvaṇayalē māṇiṇi māṇunnayāṇa purisāṇaṁ ।
ahavā pāvanti siriṁ ahava bhamantā samappanti ॥ 5 ॥
bēṇṇi vi hunti gaīō sāhasavantāṇa dhīrapurisāṇaṁ ।
vēllahalakamalahatthā rāyasirī ahava pavvajjā ॥ 6 ॥
ahavā maranti guruvasaṇapēlliyā khaṇḍiūṇa niyajīhaṁ ।
nō gantūṇa khalāṇaṁ cavanti dīṇakkharaṁ dhīrā ॥ 7 ॥
aha suppaï piyamāliṅgiūṇa uttuṅgathōrathaṇavaṭṭhē ।
aha narakaraṅkakaṅkālasaṅkulē bhīsaṇamasāṇē ॥ 8 ॥
aha bhuñjaï saha piyakāmiṇīhi kaccōlathālasippīhiṁ ।
ahavā vimalakavālē bhikkhaṁ bhamiūṇa pēyavaṇē ॥ 9 ॥
namiūṇa jaṁ viḍhappaï khalacalaṇaṁ tihuyaṇaṁ pi kiṁ tēṇa ।
māṇēṇa jaṁ viḍhappaï taṇaṁ pi taṁ nivvuiṁ kuṇaï ॥ 10 ॥
tē dhannā tāṇa namō tē garuyā māṇiṇō thirārambhā ।
jē garuyavasaṇapaḍipēlliyā vi annaṁ na patthanti ॥ 11 ॥
tuṅgō cciya hōi maṇō maṇaṁsiṇō antimāsu vi dasāsu ।
atthantassa vi raïṇō kiraṇā uddhaṁ ciya phuranti ॥ 12 ॥
tā tuṅgō mērugirī mayaraharō tāva hōi duttārō ।
tā visamā kajjagaī jāva na dhīrā pavajjanti ॥ 13 ॥
tā vitthiṇṇaṁ gayaṇaṁ tāva cciya jalaharā aïgahīrā ।
tā garuyā kulasēlā jāva na dhīrēhi tullanti ॥ 14 ॥
mērū tiṇaṁ va saggō gharaṅgaṇaṁ hatthachittaṁ gayaṇayalaṁ ।
vāhaliyā ya samuddā sāhasavantāṇa purisāṇaṁ ॥ 15 ॥
saṅghaḍiyaghaḍiyavighaḍiyaghaḍantavighaḍantasaṅghaḍijjantaṁ ।
avahatthiūṇa divvaṁ karēi dhīrō samāraddhaṁ ॥ 16 ॥
sāhasamavalambantō pāvaï hiyaïcchiyaṁ na sandēhō ।
jēṇuttamaṅgamēttēṇa rāhuṇā kavaliō candō ॥ 1 ॥
taṁ kiṁ pi sāhasaṁ sāhasēṇa sāhanti sāhasasahāvā ।
jaṁ bhāviūṇa divvō paraṁmuhō dhuṇaï niyasīsaṁ ॥ 2 ॥
tharatharaï dharā khubbhanti sāyarā hōi vimhalō1 daïvō ।
asamavavasāyasāhasasaṁladdhajasāṇa dhīrāṇaṁ ॥ 3 ॥
agaṇiyasamavisamāṇaṁ sāhasatuṅgē samāruhantāṇaṁ ।
rakkhaï dhīrāṇa maṇaṁ āsannabhayāulō daïvō ॥ 4 ॥
taṁ kiṁ pi kammarayaṇaṁ dhīrā vavasanti sāhasavasēṇaṁ ।
jaṁ bambhahariharāṇa vi laggaï cittē camakkārō ॥ 5 ॥
dhīrēṇa samaṁ samasīsiyāi rē divva āruhantassa ।
hōhii kiṁ pi kalaṅkaṁ dhuvvantaṁ jaṁ na phiṭiṭahii ॥ 6 ॥
jaha jaha na samappaï vihivasēṇa vihaḍantakajjapariṇāmō ।
taha taha dhīrāṇa maṇē vaḍḍhaï biuṇō samucchāhō ॥ 7 ॥
phalasampattīi samōṇayāi tuṅgāi phalavipattīē ।
hiyayāi supurisāṇaṁ mahātarūṇaṁ va siharāiṁ ॥ 8 ॥
hiyaē jāō tatthēva vaḍiḍhaō nēya payaḍiō lōē ।
vavasāyapāyavō supurisāṇa lakkhijjaï phalēhiṁ1 ॥ 9 ॥
vavasāyaphalaṁ vihavō vihavassa ya vihalajaṇasamuddharaṇaṁ ।
vihaluddharaṇēṇa jasō jasēṇa bhaṇa kiṁ na pajjattaṁ ॥ 10 ॥
āḍhattā sappurisēhi tuṅgavavasāyadinnahiyaēhiṁ ।
kajjārambhā hōhinti nipphalā kaha ciraṁ kālaṁ ॥ 11 ॥
na mahumahaṇassa1 vacchē majjhē kamalāṇa nēya khīraharē ।
vavasāyasāyarē supurisāṇa lacchī phuḍaṁ vasaï ॥ 12 ॥
taddiyahārambhaviyāvaḍāṇa mittēkkakajjarasiyāṇaṁ ।
ravirahaturayāṇa va supurisāṇa na hu hiyayavīsāmō ॥ 13 ॥
atthō vijjā purisattaṇaṁ ca annāi guṇasahassāiṁ ।
divvāyattē kajjē savvāi narassa vihaḍanti ॥ 1 ॥
satthatthē paḍiyassa vi majjhēṇaṁ ēi kiṁ pi taṁ kajjaṁ ।
jaṁ na kahiuṁ na sahiuṁ na cēva pacchāiuṁ taraï ॥ 2 ॥
jaï visaï visamavivaraṁ laṅghaï uyahiṁ karēi vavasāyaṁ ।
taha vi hu phalaṁ na pāvaï purisō divvē parāhuttē ॥ 3 ॥
nagghanti guṇā vihaḍanti bandhavā vallahā virajjanti ।
vavasāō na samappaï narassa divvē parāhuttē ॥ 4 ॥
jaṁ jaṁ ḍālaṁ lambaï hatthē gahiūṇa vīsamaï jattha ।
sā sā taḍatti tudr̥i narassa divvē parāhuttē ॥ 5 ॥
jaṁ nayaṇēhi na dīsaï hiyaēṇa vi jaṁ na cintiyaṁ kaha vi ।
taṁ taṁ sirambhi nivaḍaï narassa divvē parāhuttē ॥ 6 ॥
khaṇḍijjaï vihiṇā sasaharō vi sūrassa hōi atthamaṇaṁ ।
hā divvapariṇaīē kavalijjaï kō na kālēṇaṁ ॥ 1 ॥
kō ēttha sayā suhiō kassa va lacchī virāi pēmmāiṁ ।
kassa va na hōi khalaṇaṁ bhaṇa kō hu na khaṇḍiō vihiṇā ॥ 2 ॥
unnaya nīyā nīyā vi unnayā hunti takkhaṇa ccēva ।
vihipariṇāmiyakajjaṁ hariharabamhā na yāṇanti ॥ 3 ॥
vihiṇā jaṁ ciya lihiyaṁ nalāḍavaṭṭīi tēṇa daïvēṇa ।
pacchā sō vi pasannō annaha kariuṁ na hu samatthō ॥ 4 ॥
kiṁ karaï kira varāō sāhasavavasāyamāṇagaruō vi ।
purisō bhaggapayāvō vihiṇā vivarīyarūvēṇa ॥ 5 ॥
bēṇṇi vi mahaṇārambhē pēcchaha jaṁ puvvakammapariṇāmō ।
uppajjaï haraï visaṁ kaṇhassa ghaṇatthaṇā lacchī ॥ 6 ॥
cihivihiyaṁ ciya labbhaï amayaṁ dēvāṇa mahumahē lacchī
rayaṇāyarammi mahiē harassa bhāē visaṁ jāyaṁ ॥ 7 ॥
parapatthaṇāpavannaṁ mā jaṇaṇi jaṇēsu ērisaṁ puttaṁ ।
uyarē vi mā dharijjasu patthaṇabhaṅgō kaō jēṇa ॥ 1 ॥
tā rūvaṁ tāva guṇā lajjā saccaṁ kulakkamō tāva ।
tāva cciya ahimāṇō dēhi tti nabhaṇṇaē jāva ॥ 2 ॥
tiṇatūlā vi hu lahuyaṁ dīṇaṁ daïvēṇa nimmiyaṁ bhuvēṇa ।
vāēṇa kiṁ na nīyaṁ appāṇaṁ patthaṇabhaēṇa ॥ 3 ॥
tharatharatharēi hiyayaṁ jīhā ghōlēi kaṇṭhamajjhammi ।
nāsaï muhalāvaṇṇaṁ dēhi tti paraṁ bhaṇantassa ॥ 4 ॥
kisiṇijjanti layantā uyahijalaṁ jalaharā payattēṇa ।
dhavalīhunti hu dēntā dēntalayantantaraṁ pēccha ॥ 5 ॥
dāriddaya tujjha guṇā gōvijjantā vi dhīrapurisēhiṁ ।
pāhuṇaēsu chaṇēsu ya vasaṇēsu ya pāyaḍā hunti ॥ 1 ॥
dāriddaya tujjha namō jassa pasāēṇa ērisī riddhī ।
pēcchāmi sayalalōē tē maha1 lōyā na pēcchanti ॥ 2 ॥
jē jē guṇiṇō jē jē vi māṇiṇō jē viyaḍḍhasaṁmāṇā ।
dālidda rē viyakkhaṇa tāṇa tumaṁ sāṇurāō si ॥ 3 ॥
dīsanti jōyasiddhā añjaṇasiddhā vi kē vi dīsanti ।
dāriddajōyasiddhaṁ maṁ tē lōyā na pēcchanti ॥ 4 ॥
jē bhaggā vihavasamīraṇēṇa vaṅkaṁ ṭhavanti payamaggaṁ ।
tē nūṇaṁ dāliddōsahēṇa jaï pañjalijjanti ॥ 5 ॥
kiṁ vā kulēṇa kīraï kiṁ vā viṇaēṇa kiṁ ca rūvēṇa ।
dhaṇarahiyāṇaṁ sundari narāṇa kō āyaraṁ kuṇaï ॥ 6 ॥
jāī rūvaṁ vijjā tinni vi gacchantu kandarē vivarē ।
atthō cciya parivaḍḍhaü jēṇa guṇā pāyaḍā hunti ॥ 7 ॥
dhammatthakāmarahiyā jē diyahā niddhaṇāṇa vōlīṇā ।
jaï tāi gaṇēi vihī gaṇēu na hu ērisaṁ juttaṁ ॥ 8 ॥
saṅkuyaï saṅkuyantē viyasaï viyasantayambhi sūrammi ।
sisirē rōrakuḍumbaṁ paṅkayalīlaṁ samuvvahaha ॥ 9 ॥
chajjaï pahussa laliyaṁ piyāi māṇō khamā samatthassa ।
jāṇantassa ya bhaṇiyaṁ mōṇaṁ ca ayāṇamāṇassa ॥ 1 ॥
sacchandaṁ bōlijjaï kijjaï jaṁ niyamaṇassa paḍihāi ।
ajasassa na bīhijjaï pahuttaṇaṁ tēṁṇa ramaṇijjaṁ ॥ 2 ॥
jammadiṇē thaṇaṇivaḍaṇabhaēṇa dijjanti dhāiucchaṅgē ।
pahuṇō jaṁ nīyarayā mannē taṁ khīramāhappaṁ ॥ 3 ॥
hiṭṭhaṭṭhē jaḍaṇivahaṁ taha ya supattāi uttamaṅgēsu ।
jaha hōi tarū taha jaï pahuṇō tā kiṁ na pajjattaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
jaṁ sēvayāṇa dukkhaṁ cārittavivajjiyāṇa naraṇāha ।
taṁ hōu tuha riūṇaṁ ahavā tāṇaṁ pi mā hōu ॥ 1 ॥
bhūmīsayaṇaṁ jaracīrabandhaṇaṁ bambhacērayaṁ bhikkhā ।
muṇicariyaṁ duggayasēvayāṇa dhammō paraṁ natthi ॥ 2 ॥
jaï nāma kaha vi sōkkhaṁ hōi tulaggēṇa sēvayajaṇassa ।
tēṁ khavaṇayasaggārōhaṇaṁ va viggōvayasaēhiṁ ॥ 3 ॥
ōlaggiō si dhammammi hōjja ēṇhiṁ narinda vaccāmō ।
ālihiyakuñjarassa va tuha pahu dāṇaṁ ciya na diṭṭhaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
āsannaphalō phaṇasō vva nāha sayalassa sēvayajaṇassa ।
amhaṁ puṇa patthiva patthiō vi tālō tumaṁ jāō ॥ 5 ॥
phaṇasēṇa samaṁ mahimaṇḍalammi kā taruvarāṇa samasīsī ।
karikumbhasacchahaṁ maggaṇāṇa jō dēi phalaṇivahaṁ ॥ 6 ॥
varisihisi tumaṁ jalahara bharihisi bhuvaṇantarāi nīsēsaṁ ।
taṇhāsusiyasarīrē muyammi vappīhayakiḍumbē ॥ 7 ॥
dēhi tti kaha nu bhaṇṇaï supurisavavahārabāhiraṁ vayaṇaṁ ।
sēvijjaï viṇaēṇaṁ ēsa cciya patthaṇā lōē ॥ 8 ॥
bhuñjanti kasaṇaḍasaṇā abbhantarasaṇṭhiyā gaṁindassa ।
jē uṇa vihurasahāyā tē dhavalā bāhira ccēva ॥ 9 ॥
tambāu tinni supaōharāu cattāri pakkalabaïllā ।
nippannā rālayamañjarīu sēvā suhaṁ kuṇaü ॥ 10 ॥
savvō chuhiō sōhaï maḍhadēulamandiraṁ ca cañcarayaṁ ।
naraṇāha maha kuḍumbaṁ chuhachuhiyaṁ dubbalaṁ hōi ॥ 11 ॥
jaṁ dijjaï paharaparavvasēhi mucchāgaēhi payamēkkaṁ ।
taha nēhassa payassa va na yāṇimō kō samabbhahi ō ॥ 1 ॥
bhaggē vi balē valiē vi sāhaṇē sāmiē nirucchāhē ।
niyamuyavikkamasārā thakkanti kuluggayā suhaḍā ॥ 2 ॥
viyalaï dhaṇaṁ na māṇaṁ jhijjaï aṅgaṁ na jhijjaï payāvō ।
rūvaṁ calaï na phuraṇaṁ siviṇē vi maṇaṁsisatthāṇaṁ ॥ 3 ॥
avamāṇiō vva saṁmāṇiō vva navasēvaō vva kuviō vva ।
paharaï kayāvarāhō vva nibbhaō kō vi saṅgāmē ॥ 4 ॥
uyarē asikappariē antōhē nivaḍiyammi calaṇēsu ।
bhamaï bhaḍō jasaluddhō sasaṅkalō mattahatthi vva ॥ 5 ॥
dāhiṇakarēṇa khaggaṁ vāmēṇa siraṁ dharēi nivaḍantaṁ ।
antāvēḍhiyacalaṇō jāi1 bhaḍō ēkkamēkkassa ॥ 6 ॥
ajja vi vihurō supahū ajja vi paharanti suhaḍasaṅghāyā ।
ajja vi majjhatthā jayasirī vi tā jīva mā vacca ॥ 7 ॥
nēcchaï saggaggamaṇaṁ kuvaï bhaḍō suravahūhi nijjantō ।
garuyapaḍivakkhapēlliyasāmiyakajjē aṇimmāē ॥ 8 ॥
ēkkō vi kō vi niyagōttabhūsaṇō dharaü jaṇaṇiuyarammi ।
jō riughaḍāṇa samuhō paraṁmuhō parakalattāṇaṁ ॥ 9 ॥
viyaḍaṁ sō parisakkaü sāmipasāyaṁ ca sō samuvvahaü ।
duvvāravērivāraṇaṇivāraṇā jassa bhuyadaṇḍā ॥ 10 ॥
ēkkaṁ dantammi payaṁ bīyaṁ kumbhammi taïyamalahantō ।
balibandhavilasiyaṁ mahumahassa ālambaē suhaḍō ॥ 11 ॥
calacamarakaṇṇacāliravijjijjantō bhaḍō gaïndēṇa ।
ō suvaï sāmikayakajjaṇibbharō dantapallaṅkē ॥ 12 ॥
gāḍhāsaṇassa kassa vi uyarē nihayassa maṇḍalaggēṇa ।
addhaṁ mahīi paḍiyaṁ turaṅgapiṭṭhiṭṭhiyaṁ addhaṁ ॥ 13 ॥
sabbhāvē pahuhiyaē jīē saggē jasē jaē sayalē ।
ṭhaviē raṇammi sīsē kayakajjō nacciō suhaḍō ॥ 14 ॥
chinnē raṇammi bahupahupasāyamālāpaḍicchirē sīsē ।
uttiṇṇagaruyabhāraṁ va nacciyaṁ naravarakabandhaṁ ॥ 15 ॥
pakkhāṇilēṇa pahuṇō viramaü muccha tti pāsapaḍiēṇa ।
giddhantakaḍḍhaṇaṁ dūsahaṁ pi sāhijjaï bhaḍēṇa ॥ 16 ॥
vacchatthalaṁ ca suhaḍassa rahirakuṅkumavilittayaṅgassa ।
varakāmiṇi vva cumbaï urē nisannā sivā vayaṇaṁ ॥ 17 ॥
sañcuṇṇiyathōrajuyappahārasañjaṇiyagaruyakiṇasōhō ।
dhavalassa mahābharakaḍḍhaṇāi kandhō cciya kahēi ॥ 1 ॥
aha maraï dhurālaggō sañcuṇṇiyasandhibandhaṇō dhavalō ।
na hu pāmarassa vihurē ārāparighaṭṭaṇaṁ sahaï ॥ 2 ॥
aha tōḍaï niyakandhaṁ aha kaḍḍhaï gurubharammi duvvōjjhaṁ ।
dhavalō dhurammi juttō na sahaï uccāriyaṁ hakkaṁ ॥ 3 ॥
cikvaṇacikkhallacahuṭṭacakkathakkē bharammi jāṇihisi ।
avisēsannaya gahavaï paraṁmuhō jaṁ si dhavalāṇaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
amuṇiyaguṇō na juppaï1 na muṇijjaï sa ya guṇō ajuttassa
thakkē bharē visūraï aüvvavaggaṁ gaō dhavalō ॥ 5 ॥
sō cciya sayaḍē sō cciya halammi sō cciya vahēi piṭṭhīē ।
bahugōdhaṇō vi haliō nandaï ēkkēṇa dhavalēṇa ॥ 6 ॥
kattō labbhanti dhurandharāi dhavalāi bharasamatthāiṁ ।
aïvihurē gurubhāraṁ kaḍḍhanti ya līlamattāē ॥ 7 ॥
dantacchōhaṁ taḍaviyaḍamōḍaṇaṁ sarasapallavullihaṇaṁ ।
jaï viñjhō cciya na sahaï tā kariṇō kattha vaccanti ॥ 1 ॥
sā rēvā tāi pāṇiyāi tē ccēva kariṇisaṅghāyā ।
sā sallaï sallaï gayavarassa viñjhaṁ muyantassa ॥ 2 ॥
viñjhēṇa viṇā vi gayā naravaïbhavaṇēsu gōravijjanti ।
viñjhō na hōi agaō gaēhi bahuēhi vi gaēhiṁ ॥ 3 ॥
gōmahisaturaṅgāṇaṁ pasūṇa savvāṇa jujjaē ṭhāṇaṁ ।
daḍḍhagaïndāṇa puṇō aha viñjhō aha mahārāō ॥ 4 ॥
viyaliyamaēṇa gayajōvvaṇēṇa hallantadantamusalēṇa ।
ajja vi vaṇaṁ saṇāhaṁ jūhāhiva paï jiyantēṇa ॥ 1 ॥
ajja vi sambharaï gaō majjantō saravarammi līlāē ।
jaṁ kariṇikaraggummūliēṇa pahaō muṇālēṇa ॥ 2 ॥
mā sumarasu candaṇapallavāṇa kariṇāha gēṇha tiṇakavalaṁ ।
jā jaha pariṇamaha dasā taṁ taha dhīrā paḍicchanti ॥ 3 ॥
mā jhijjasu aṇudiyahaṁ kariṇiviōēṇa mūḍha kariṇāha ।
sōkkhaṁ na hōi kassa vi nirantaraṁ ēttha saṁsārē ॥ 4 ॥
jāyāsuyavirahavisaṇṭhulassa jūhāhivassa viñjhammi ।
tē sarasapallavā sallaīi visakavalasāricchā ॥ 5 ॥
garuyachuhāuliyassa ya vallahakariṇīsuhaṁ bharantassa ।
sarasō muṇālakavalō gayassa hatthē cciya vilīṇō ॥ 6 ॥
taha nīsasiyaṁ jūhāhivēṇa ciravilasiyaṁ bharantēṇa ।
karagahiyaṁ tiṇakavalaṁ hariyaṁ jaha jhatti pajjaliyaṁ ॥ 7 ॥
virahapalittō rē varagaïnda mā bhañja sayalavaṇarāī ।
ummūliē vi viñjhē virahāvatthā taha ccēya ॥ 8 ॥
jūhāō vaṇagahaṇaṁ gahaṇāu saraṁ sarāu girisiharaṁ ।
siharāhintō puhaviṁ niēi hatthī piyāvirahē ॥ 9 ॥
kariṇikarappiyaṇavasarasasallaīkavalabhōyaṇaṁ dantī ।
jaï na maraï sumarantō tā kiṁ kisiō vi mā hōu ॥ 10 ॥
kiṁ karaï kuraṅgī bahusuēhi vavasāyamāṇarahiēhiṁ ।
ēkkēṇa vi gayaghaḍadāraṇēṇa siṁhī suhaṁ suvaï ॥ 1 ॥
jāivisuddhāṇa namō tāṇa maïndāṇa ahaha jiyalōē ।
jē jē kulammi jāyā tē tē gayakumbhaṇiddalaṇā ॥ 2 ॥
mā jāṇaha jaha1 tuṅgattaṇēṇa purisāṇa hōi sōṇḍīraṁ ।
maḍahō vi maïndō karivarāṇa kumbhatthalaṁ dalaï ॥ 3 ॥
bēṇṇi vi raṇṇuppannā bajjhanti gayā na cēva kēsariṇō ।
sambhāvijjaï maraṇaṁ na gañjaṇaṁ dhīrapurisāṇaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
ēkkasarapaharadāriyamāindagaïndajujjhamābhiḍiē ।
vāhi na lajjasi naccasi dōhaggē pāyaḍijjantē ॥ 1 ॥
kattō taṁ rāyadharēsu vilasiyaṁ jaṁ gharammi vāhassa ।
gayakumbhaviyāriyamōttiēhi jaṁ jaṅgalaṁ kiṇaï ॥ 2 ॥
ajja kayatthō diyahō vāhavahū rūvajōvvaṇummaïyā ।
sōhaggaṁ dhaṇurumpacchalēṇa racchāsu vikkhiraï ॥ 3 ॥
ō khippaï maṇḍalamāruēṇa gēhaṅgaṇāu vāhīē ।
sōhaggadhayavaḍāi vva dhaṇuraōrumpariñchōlī ॥ 4 ॥
jaha jaha vaḍḍhanti thaṇā taha taha jhijjanti pañca vatthūṇi ।
majjhaṁ paï kōyaṇḍaṁ pallijuvāṇā savattīō ॥ 5 ॥
jaha jaha vaḍḍhanti thaṇā viyasaï mayaṇō savammahā diṭṭhī ।
taha taha vāhajuvāṇō diyahē diyahē dhaṇullihaï ॥ 6 ॥
jaha jaha na caḍaï cāvō ummillaï karaï palliṇāhassa ।
taha taha suṇhā vipphullagaṇḍavivarummuhī hasaï ॥ 7 ॥
dinnaṁ thaṇāṇa agdhaṁ kariṇījūhēṇa vāhavahuyāē ।
raṇḍattaṇaṁ na pattaṁ hē sundari tuha pasāēṇa ॥ 8 ॥
sihipēhuṇāvayaṁsā vahuyā vāhassa gavvirī1 bhamaï ।
gayamuttāgahiyapasāhaṇāṇa majjhē savattīṇaṁ ॥ 9 ॥
vāṇiyaya hatthidantā kattō amhāṇa vagghakittīō ।
uttuṅgathōrathaṇavaṭṭasālasā jaṁ vahū suvaï ॥ 10 ॥
vagghāṇa nahā sīhāṇa kēsarā mōttiyā gaïndāṇaṁ ।
kattō vāṇiya amhaṁ mayacammapariggahō natthi ॥ 11 ॥
hariṇā jāṇanti guṇā raṇṇē vasiūṇa 1gēyamāhappaṁ ।
tāṇaṁ ciya natthi dhaṇaṁ jīyaṁ vāhassa appanti ॥ 1 ॥
amhāṇa tiṇaṅkurabhōyaṇāṇa na hu kiñci sañciyaṁ daviṇaṁ ।
maha maṁsapiṇḍatuṭṭhō jaï vaccaï tā ahaṁ dhannō ॥ 2 ॥
ēkkēṇa vi saraü sarēṇa vāha kiṁ bīyaēṇa gahiēṇa ।
ēkkaṁ pi vasaï jīyaṁ hayāsa dōṇhaṁ pi ya sarīrē ॥ 3 ॥
sarasalliēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kandhaṁ dhuṇiūṇa juṇṇahariṇēṇa ।
gijjaü puṇō vi gijjaü jāva ya kaṇṭhaṭṭhiō jīvō ॥ 4 ॥
ghāēṇa maō saddēṇa maī cōjjēṇa vāhavahuyā vi ।
avaṭhambhiūṇa dhaṇuhaṁ vāhēṇa vi mukkiyā1 pāṇā ॥ 5 ॥
kaṅkēllipallavōvvēllamaṇaharē jaï vi nandaṇē caraï ।
karahassa taha vi maruvilasiyāi hiyaē khuḍukkanti ॥ 1 ॥
tē girisiharā tē pīlupallavā tē karīrakasarakkā ।
labbhanti karaha maruvilasiyāi kattō vaṇētthammi ॥ 2 ॥
puṇaruttapasāriyadīhr̥kandharō karaha kiṁ palōēsi ।
kattō labbhanti marutthalīu divvē parāhuttē ॥ 3 ॥
dīhuṇhapaüraṇīsāsasōsiyāsēsapīlusayasiharō ।
kavalaṁ pi na gēṇhasi karaha muddha kiṁ cakkhiyamapuvvaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
unnayakandhara mā jūra karaha tā dharasu kiṁ ci cariūṇa ।
tuha jōggā akkamarutthalīi1 tuṅgā tarū kattō ॥ 5 ॥
jaṁ jīhāi vilaggaṁ kiñci varaṁ māmi tassa taṁ diṭṭhaṁ ।
thukkēi cakkhiuṁ vaṇasayāi karahō dhuyaggīvō ॥ 6 ॥
annēhiṁ pi na pattā pattalakarahēhi karaha sā vēllī ।
kō ēsō tujjhaṁ gahō jaṁ cintasi viñjhasiharāiṁ ॥ 7 ॥
taha tuha virahē mālaï mahimaṇḍalavandaṇijjamayarandē ।
parijhīṇaṁ bhamaraülaṁ jaha jāyaṁ masayavandaṁ va ॥ 1 ॥
vaḍḍhasu mālaïkaliē nibbharamayarandaparimaluggārē ।
muñcantu chappayā sēsakusumasēvākilēsassa ॥ 2 ॥
viyasantu nāma gandhuddhurāu sēsāu kusumajāīō ।
indindirassa raṇaraṇayakāraṇaṁ mālaï ccēva ॥ 3 ॥
maḍahaṁ mālaïkaliyaṁ mahuyara daṭrṭhūṇa kiṁ parāhuttō ।
ēttō pasaraï bhuvaṇantarāi gandhō viyambhantō ॥ 4 ॥
maḍahulliyāi kiṁ tuha imīi kiṁ vā dalēhi tāliṇēhiṁ ।
āmōē mahuyara mālaīi jāṇihisi māhappaṁ ॥ 5 ॥
taha vāsiyaṁ vaṇaṁ mālaīi kuṁsuṁmēhi nibbharaṁ saraē ।
jaha ittha tattha kattha vi bhamarā dukkhēhi lakkhantē ॥ 6 ॥
kā samasīsī saha mālaīi sēsāṇa kusumajāīṇaṁ ।
jassa vi gandhavilittā bhasalā bhasalēhi pijjanti ॥ 7 ॥
kaliyāmisēṇa ubbhēvi aṅguliṁ mālaīi mahamahiyaṁ ।
dharaü1 ju dharaṇasatthō maha ēntō mahuyarajuvāṇō ॥ 8 ॥
pakkhukkhēvaṁ nahasūikhaṇḍaṇaṁ bhamarabharasamuvvahaṇaṁ ।
uva sahaï tharaharantī vi dubbalā mālaï ccēva ॥ 9 ॥
indindira chappaya bhasala bhamara bhamiō si kāṇaṇaṁ sayalaṁ ।
mālaïsarisaṁ kusumaṁ jaï diṭṭhaṁ kiṁ na tā bhaṇasi ॥ 1 ॥
kattha vi dalaṁ na gandhaṁ kattha vi gandhō na paüramayarandō ।
ēkkakusumammi mahuyara bē tinni guṇā na labbhanti ॥ 2 ॥
ēkkaṁ mahuyarahiyayaṁ taṁ ciya puṇa mālaīi paḍiruddhaṁ ।
sēsā phullantu phalantu pāyavā kō nivārēi ॥ 3 ॥
mālaï puṇō vi mālaï hā mālaï mālaï tti jampantō ।
uvviggō1 bhamaï alī hiṇḍantō sayalavaṇarāī ॥ 4 ॥
ruṇaruṇaï valaï2 vēllaï pakkhaüḍaṁ dhuṇaï khivaï aṅgāiṁ ।
mālaïkaliyāvirahē pañcāvatthaṁ gaō bhamarō ॥ 5 ॥
mālaïvirahē rē taruṇabhasala mā ruvasu nibbharukkaṇṭhaṁ ।
vallahaviōyadukkhaṁ maraṇēṇa viṇā na vīsaraï ॥ 6 ॥
jāva na visaraï sarasā varaï na īsaṁ pi mālaīkaliyā ।
āviṇīyamahuyarōhiṁ tāva cciya pāumāraddhā ॥ 7 ॥
viyasantasarasatāmarasabhasala viyasēi mālaī jāva ।
tā jattha va tattha va jaha va taha va diyahā gamijjanti ॥ 8 ॥
chappaï gamēsu kālaṁ vāsavakusumāi tāva mā muyasu ।
manna jiyantō pēcchasi paürā1 riddhī vasantassa ॥ 9 ॥
mā indidira tuṅgasu paṅkayadalaṇilaya mālaīvirahē ।
tumbiṇikusumāi na sampaḍanti divvē parāhuttē ॥ 10 ॥
iyarakusumēsu mahuyara dē bandha raïṁ vimuñca raṇaraṇayaṁ ।
jhāyantō cciya marihisi kattō tē mālaī saraē ॥ 11 ॥
bhamarō bhamarō tti guṇōjjhiēhi kusumēhi lāiō dōsō ।
lahiūṇa mālaïṁ puṇa sō niuṇō bhamaü jaï bhamaï ॥ 12 ॥
kundalayāmaülapariṭiṭhaēṇa bhariūṇa mālaïvilāsaṁ ।
taha nīsasiyaṁ indindirēṇa jaha sā vi pajjāliyā ॥ 13 ॥
vōsaṭṭabahalaparimalakēyaïmayarandavāsiyaṅgassa ।
hiyaïcchiyapiyalambhā1 cirā sayā kassa jāyanti ॥ 14 ॥
viyaliyadalaṁ pi gandhōjjhiyaṁ pi virasaṁ pi mālaīviḍavaṁ ।
bhasalēhi nēya mukkaṁ paḍhamarasaṁ sambharantēhiṁ ॥ 15 ॥
1ḍhaṅkharasēsō vi hu mahuyērahi mukkō na mālaīviḍavō ।
daraviyasiyakaliyāmōyabahalimaṁ sambharantēhiṁ ॥ 16 ॥
nibiḍadalasaṇṭhiyaṁ pi hu kaliyaṁ viyasāviūṇa savisē vaṁ
jē paḍhamaṁ tīi rasaṁ piyanti tē chappayā chēyā ॥ 17 ॥
vasiūṇa saggalēē gandhaṁ gahiūṇa pārijāyassa ।
rē bhasala kiṁ na lajjasi cumbantō iyarakusumāiṁ ॥ 1 ॥
kattō lavaṅgakaliyā icchaṁ pūrēi chēyabhasalassa ।
amaratarubhañjarirasēṇa jassa āṇandiyaṁ hiyayaṁ ॥ 2 ॥
bhamara bhamantēṇa taē aṇēyavaṇagahaṇakāṇaṇuddēsaṁ ।
diṭṭhō suō ya kattha vi sarisatarū parijāyassa ॥ 3 ॥
amaratarukusumamañjari vāuhayā mahuyarēṇa jaṁ rasiyā ।
talladdharasēṇa kaō saṅkappō sēsakusumāṇaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
haṁsō si mahāsaramaṇḍaṇō si dhavalō si dhavala kiṁ tujjha ।
khalavāyasāṇa majjhē tā haṁsaya kattha paḍiō si ॥ 1 ॥
haṁsō masāṇamajjhē kāō jaï vasaï paṅkayavaṇammi ।
taha vi hu haṁsō haṁsō kāō kāō cciya varāō ॥ 2 ॥
ahiṇavaghaṇaücchaliyā savittharā1 jaï vi pāusavasēṇa ।
taha vi hu kiṁ sēvijjaï vāhaliyā rāyahaṁsēhiṁ ॥ 3 ॥
bē vi sapakkhā taha bē vi dhavalayā bē vi saravaraṇivāsā ।
taha vi hu haṁsabayāṇaṁ jāṇijjaï antaraṁ garuyaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
navaṇaliṇamuṇālullōlamaliyaṁ haṁsa māṇasaṁ mōttuṁ ।
lajjāi kaha na mūō sēvantō gāmavāhaliyaṁ ॥ 5 ॥
ēkkēṇa ya pāsapariṭṭhiēṇa haṁsēṇa hōi jā sōhā ।
taṁ saravarō na pāvaï bahuēhi vi ḍhiṅkasatthēhiṁ ॥ 6 ॥
māṇasasararahiyāṇaṁ jaha na suhaṁ hōi rāyahaṁsāṇaṁ ।
taha tassa vi tēhi viṇā tīrucchaṅgā na sōhanti ॥ 7 ॥
savvāyarēṇa rakkhaha taṁ purisaṁ jattha jayasirī vasaï ।
atthāmiya candabimbē tārāhi na kīraē jōṇhā ॥ 1 ॥
jaha jaha vaḍḍhēi sasī taha taha ō pēccha ghēppaï maēṇa ।
vayaṇijjavajjiyāō kassa vi jaï hunti riddhīō ॥ 2 ॥
jaï candō kiṁ bahutāraēhi bahuēhi kiṁ ca tēṇa viṇā ।
jassa payāsō lōē dhavalēi mahāmahīvaṭṭhaṁ1 ॥ 3 ॥
candassa khaō na hu tārayāṇa riddhī vi tassa na hu tāṇaṁ ।
garuyāṇa caḍaṇapaḍaṇaṁ iyarā uṇa niccapaḍiyā ya ॥ 4 ॥
rayaṇāyarammi jammō harasiratilaō sahōyarā lacchī ।
vihaḍiyakalākalāvō dasiyā vi samīhaē candō ॥ 5 ॥
harasirasaraṇammi gaō lukkantō taha jaḍāṇa majjhammi ।
taha vi gilijjaï candō vihivihiyaṁ kō nivārēi ॥ 6 ॥
nayaraṁ na hōi aṭṭālaēhi pāyāratuṅgasiharēhiṁ ।
gāmō vi hōi nayaraṁ jattha chaïllō jaṇō vasaï ॥ 1 ॥
nivasanti jattha chēyā laliyakkharakavvabandhaṇē kusalā ।
jāṇanti vaṅkabhaṇiyaṁ sundari nayaraṁ, na sō gāmō ॥ 2 ॥
jō jampiūṇa jāiṇa jampiyamattaṁ ca jāṇaē atthaṁ ।
dēsō tēṇa pavittō acchaü nayaraṁ vasantēṇa ॥ 3 ॥
guruvihavalaṅghiyā1 avi āvaï pattā vi āuramaṇā vi ।
siviṇantarē vi chēyā niyakajjaṁ nēya siḍhilanti ॥ 4 ॥
annaṁ dharanti hiyaē annaṁ vāyāi kīraē annaṁ ।
chēyāṇa patthivāṇa ya khalāṇa maggō cciya aüvvō ॥ 5 ॥
chēyāṇa jēhi kajjaṁ na hu hōsaï jēhi jabhmalakkhē vi1 ।
dōhiṁ pi tēhi sarisaṁsarisa cciya2 hunti ullāvā ॥ 6 ॥
sabbhāvabāhabirēhiṁ taha kaha vi piyakkharēhi jampanti ।
jaha bandhava tti kaliuṁ lōē sīsēhi vubbhanti ॥ 7 ॥
diṭṭhītulāi bhuvaṇaṁ tulanti jē cittacēlaē nihiyaṁ ।
kō tāṇa chēyavāṇijjayāṇa bhaṇa khaṇḍaṇaṁ kuṇaï ॥ 8 ॥
taṁ natthi taṁ na hūyaṁ na hu hōsaï taṁ ca tihuyaṇē sayalē ।
taṁ vihiṇā vi na vihiyaṁ jaṁ na hu nāyaṁ chaïllēhiṁ1 ॥ 9 ॥
jaha paḍhamadiṇē taha pacchimammi pharusāi nēya jampanti ।
avvō mahāṇubhāvā virajjamāṇā vi dullakkhā ॥ 10 ॥
bahukūḍakavaḍabhariyāṇa putti chēyāṇa jō piḍē paḍaï ।
sō sunnō sunnamaṇō siviṇē vi na pāvaē sukkhaṁ ॥ 11॥
jaï kaha vi tāṇa chappannayāṇa2 taṇuyaṅgi gōyarē paḍasi ।
tā thōravasaṇadāhēkkamaṇḍiyā dukkaraṁ jiyasi ॥ 12 ॥
mā putti vaṅkavaṅkaṁ jampasu puraō chaïllalōyāṇaṁ ।
hiyaē jaṁ ca nihittaṁ taṁ pi hayāsā muṇanti buddhīē ॥ 13 ॥
līlāvalōyaṇēṇa vi muṇanti jē putti hiyayaparamatthaṁ ।
tē kārimaüvayārēhi kaha nu chēyā chalijjanti ॥ 14 ॥
sahasa tti jaṁ na diṭṭhō saralasahāvēṇa jaṁ na ālattō ।
avayārō jaṁ na kaō taṁ ciya kaliyaṁ chaïllēhiṁ ॥ 15 ॥
kaṇṭhabbhantaraṇiggayadaraghōliraghurahurantahuṅkāraṁ ।
khalirakkharaṁ pi māraï panthiya mā pañcamaṁ suṇasu ॥ 1 ॥
ghōlantatāravaṇṇujjalēṇa varataruṇikaṇṇalaggēṇa ।
lōyaṇajuyalēṇa va pañcamēṇa bhava kō na santaviō ॥ 2 ॥
annē vi gāmarāyā gijjantā dēnti sayalasōkkhāiṁ ।
ēyassa puṇō hayapañcamassa annō camakkārō ॥ 3 ॥
appaṇakajjēṇa vi dīharacchi thōrayaradīharaṇaraṇayā ।
pañcamasarapasaruggāragabbhiṇā ēnti nīsāsā ॥ 4 ॥
taṁ vañciō si piyayama tīē bāhōhasaṁvalijjantā ।
na suyā nīsāsakhalantamantharā pañcamataraṅgā ॥ 5 ॥
summaï pañcamagēyaṁ pujjijjaï vasahavāhaṇō dēvō ।
hiyaïcchiō ramijjaï saṁsārē ittiyaṁ sāraṁ ॥ 6 ॥
nayaṇāi samāṇiyapattalāi parapurisajīvaharaṇāiṁ ।
asiyasiyāi ya muddhē khaggāi va kaṁ na māranti ॥ 1 ॥
jattō nēhassa bharō tattō nivaḍanti kasaṇadhavalāiṁ ।
calacalayakōḍimōḍaṇakarāi nayaṇāi taruṇīṇaṁ ॥ 2 ॥
saviyārasavibbhamarahasavasavisaṭṭantamaṇaharuddāmā ।
mayaṇāulāṇa diṭṭhī lakkhijjaï lakkhamajjhammi ॥ 3 ॥
jattō vilōlapamhaladhavalāi calanti1 navara nayaṇāiṁ ।
āyaṇṇapūriyasarō tattō cciya dhāvaï aṇaṅgō ॥ 4 ॥
kassa na bhindaï hiyayaṁ aṇaṅgasaradhōraṇi vva nivaḍantī ।
bālāi valiya2 lōyaṇaphurantamayaṇālasā diṭṭhī ॥ 5 ॥
nayaṇāi tujjha sundari visēṇa bhariyāi niravasēsāiṁ ।
ēmaï māranti jaṇaṁ alajji kiṁ kajjalaṁ dēsi3 ॥ 6 ॥
īsisidinnakajjalaṇīluppalasacchahēhi nayaṇēhiṁ ।
vammahamattā bālā maïyā iva bhamaï uttaṭṭhā ॥ 7 ॥
vaṅkēhi piō saralēhi sajjaṇō ujjuēhi majjhatthō ।
āyambirēhi riuṇō nayaṇāi caüvvihā hunti ॥ 8 ॥
nayaṇāṇa paḍaü vajjaṁ ahavā vajjāu vaḍḍilaṁ kiṁ pi ।
amuṇiyajaṇē vi diṭrṭhē aṇurāyaṁ jāi pāvanti ॥ 9 ॥
dhāvanti tammuhaṁ dhāriyā vi valiyāi tammi valamāṇē ।
jaṇasaṅkulē vi naccāviyāi tēṇamha nayaṇāiṁ ॥ 10 ॥
ṭhaḍḍhā khalō vva suyaṇō vva saṅgayā naravaï vva maṇḍaliyā ।
thaṇayā taha duggayacintiyaṁ va hiyaē na māyanti ॥ 1 ॥
amuhā khalō vva kuḍilā majjhaṁ sē kiviṇadāṇasāricchā ।
thaṇayā sappurisamaṇōraha vva hiyaē na māyanti ॥ 2 ॥
tulaō vva samā mittō vva saṅgayā unnaō vva kkhaliyā ।
suyaṇō vva satthahāvā suhaḍō vya samuṭiṭhayā thaṇayā ॥ 3 ॥
samaüttuṅgavisāṁlā ummanthiyakaṇayakalasasaṅkāsā ।
kāmaṇihāṇō vva thaṇā puṇṇavihūṇāṇa duppēcchā ॥ 4 ॥
uttuṅgadhaṇaṇirantarapakkāiyamāuliṅgasāricchā ।
māranti vāsabhūsiyaṇahō vva vijjujjalā thaṇayā ॥ 5 ॥
ubbimbē thaṇahārē rēhaï bālāi ghōlirō hārō ।
himagirivarasiharāō khaliō gaṅgāpavāhō vva ॥ 6 ॥
maggaṁ ciya alahantō hārō pīṇunnayāṇaṁ thaṇayāṇaṁ ।
ubbimbō bhamaï urē jam̐uṇāṇaïphēṇapuñjō vva ॥ 7 ॥
ajjhāi1 nīlakañcuyabhariuvvariyaṁ vihāi thaṇavaṭṭaṁ ।
jalabhariyajalaharantaradaruggaō candābimbō vva ॥ 8 ॥
amayā maō vva samayā sasi vva harikarisirō vva cakkalayā ।
kiviṇabbhatthaṇavimuhā pasayacchi paōharā tujjha ॥ 9 ॥
avvō na hunti thaṇayā majjha sarīrē savattiṇā jāyā ।
āliṅgaṇē vi pattē dūrē vi piyaṁ nivārēnti ॥ 10 ॥
thaṇajuyalaṁ tīi nirantaraṁ pi daṭṭhūṇa tārisaṁ paḍiyaṁ ।
mā karaü kō vi gavvaṁ ēttha asārammi saṁsārē ॥ 11 ॥
kaha nāma tīi taṁ taha sahāvagaruō vi taṇaharō paḍiō ।
ahavā mahilāṇa ciraṁ hiyaē kō nāma saṇṭhāi ॥ 12 ॥
pallaviyaṁ karayalapallavēhi paphphulliyaṁ va nayaṇēhiṁ ।
phaliyaṁ miva pīṇapaōharēhi ajjhāi lāvaṇṇaṁ ॥ 1 ॥
taha campiūṇa bhariyā vihiṇā lāvaṇṇaēṇa taṇuyaṅgī ।
jaha sē cihurataraṅgā aṅgulimagga vva dīsanti ॥ 2 ॥
annaṁ laḍahattaṇayaṁ anna cciya kā vi bāhulayachāyā ।
sāmā sāmannapayāvaïṇō rēha cciya na hōi ॥ 3 ॥
karacaraṇagaṇḍalōyaṇabāhulayājahaṇamaṇḍaluddhariyaṁ1 ।
aṅgēsu amāyantaṁ raṅkhōlaï2 tōi lāvaṇṇaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
sāmā niyambagaruyā thaṇajahaṇuvvahaṇamandasañcārā ।
lakkhijjaï mayaṇaṇarāhivassa sañcāriṇi kuḍi vva ॥ 5 ॥
sēyacchalēṇa pēcchaha taṇuē aṅgammi sē amāyantaṁ ।
lāvaṇṇaṁ ōsaraï vva tivalisōvāṇapantīhiṁ ॥ 6 ॥
daṭṭhūṇa taruṇasurayaṁ vivihapalōṭṭantakaraṇasōhillaṁ ।
dīvō vi taggayamaṇō gayaṁ pi tēllaṁ na lakkhēṁi ॥ 1 ॥
marumarumāra tti bhaṇantiyāi surayammi kēlisaṅgāmē ।
pāsaṭṭhiō vi dīvō sahasā hallapphalō jāō ॥ 2 ॥
summaï valayāṇa ravō nēurasaddō vi nibbharō jāō ।
kassa vi dhannassa gharē mahilā purisattaṇaṁ kuṇaï ॥ 3 ॥
daṭṭhūṇa rayaṇimajjhē bahuvihakaraṇēhi nibbharaṁ surayaṁ ।
ō dhuṇaï dīvaō vimbhiō vva pavaṇāhaō sīsaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
dantaṇahakkhayamahiyaṁ nigghāyapaḍantavalayaṇigghōsaṁ ।
vaṇasīhāṇa va jujjhaṁ vuttaṁ taṁ tārisaṁ surayaṁ ॥ 5 ॥
ō summaï vāsaharē vivarīyarayāi pōḍhamahilāē ।
calavalayakarapphālaṇakaṇantamaṇimēhalāsaddō ॥ 6 ॥
na vi taha paḍhamasamāgamasurayasuhē pāviē vi pariōsō ।
jaha bīyadiyaha savilakkhalakkhiē vayaṇakamalammi ॥ 7 ॥
sarahasaramaṇasamappaṇakalayalirakaṇantaṇihuyasikkāraṁ ।
labbhaï kulavahusuraē thavakkaō sayalasōkkhāṇaṁ ॥ 8 ॥
jhaṇajhaṇaï1 kaṇayaḍōrō tuṭṭaï hārō galanti rayaṇāiṁ ।
paṇḍavabhaḍasaṅgāmō āḍhattō pōḍhamahilāē ॥ 9 ॥
rēhaï surayavasāṇē addhukkhittō saṇēurō calaṇō ।
jiṇiūṇa kāmadēvaṁ samubbhiyā dhayavaḍāya vva ॥ 10 ॥
pēmmaṁ aṇāiparamatthapayaḍaṇaṁ mahumahō vva bahubhēyaṁ ।
mōhāṇurāyajaṇayaṁ avvō kiṁ vandimō niccaṁ ॥ 1 ॥
ālāvaṇēṇa ullāvaṇēṇa saṅgēṇa kōuhallēṇa ।
sōvāṇapaēhi va piyaguṇēhi pēmmaṁ samāruhaï ॥ 2 ॥
ārambhō jassa imō āsannāsāsasōsiyasarīrō ।
pariṇāmō kaha hōsaï na yāṇimō tassa pēmmassa ॥ 3 ॥
dāṇaṁ na dēi na karēi cāḍuyaṁ kahaï nēya sabbhāvaṁ ।
daṁsaṇamēttēṇa vi kiṁ pi māṇusaṁ1 amayasāricchaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
jattha na ujjaggaraō jattha na īsā visūraṇaṁ māṇaṁ ।
sabbhāvacāḍuyaṁ jattha natthi nēhō tahiṁ natthi ॥ 5 ॥
dāḍimaphalaṁ va pēmmaṁ ēkkē pakkhē ya hōi2 sakasāyaṁ ।
jāva na bīō rajjaï3 tā kiṁ mahurattaṇaṁ kuṇaï ॥ 6 ॥
na tahā mārēi visaṁ khajjantaṁ palasayaṁ pi kavalēhiṁ ।
jaha cakkhurāyarattaṁ mārēi savibbhamaṁ pēmbhaṁ ॥ 7 ॥
avvō jāṇāmi ahaṁ attaṇahiyaēṇa annahiyayāiṁ ।
mā kō vi kaha vi rajjaü1, dukkhuvvahaṇāi pēmmāiṁ ॥ 8 ॥
addiṭṭhē raṇaraṇa ō diṭṭhē īsā viḍambaṇā nāha ।
hōi na ujju va vaṅkaṁ pēmmaṁ jaha cañcu kīrassa2 ॥ 9 ॥
addiṭṭhē raṇaraṇaō diṭṭhē īsā suhaṭiṭhaē māṇaṁ ।
dūraṭiṭhaē vi dukkhaṁ piē jaṇē bhaṇa suhaṁ kattō ॥ 10 ॥
tāva cciya hōi suhaṁ jāva na kīraï piō jaṇō kō vi ।
piyasaṅgō jēhi kaō dukkhāṇa samappiō appā ॥ 11 ॥
dūraṁ gaē vi kayavippiē vi annattha baddharāē vi ।
jatthamaṇaṁ na niyattaï taṁ pēmmaṁ paricaō sēsō ॥ 12 ॥
sō suvaï suhaṁ sō dukkhavajjiō sō suhāṇa sayakhāṇī ।
vāē maṇēṇa kāēṇa jassa na hu vallahō kō vi ॥ 13 ॥
ullavaü kō vi mahimaṇḍalammi jō tēṇa natthi saṁṇaḍiō ।
kharapavaṇacāḍucāliradavaggisarisēṇa pēmmēṇa ॥ 14 ॥
sō kō vi na jīsaï sāmalaṅgi ēyammi daḍḍhahayalōē ।
jassa samappivi hiyayaṁ suhēṇa diyahā gamijjanti1 ॥ 15 ॥
avvō tahiṁ tahiṁ ciya gayaṇaṁ bhamiūṇa2 vīsamantēṇa ।
bōhitthavāyasēṇa va hasāviyā daḍḍhapēmmēṇa ॥ 16 ॥
jāē māṇappasarē phiṭṭē nēhē gayammi sabbhāvē ।
abbhatthaṇāi1 pēmmaṁ kīrantaṁ kērisaṁ hōi ॥ 17 ॥
addaṁsaṇēṇa aïdaṁsaṇēṇa diṭṭhē aṇālavantēṇa ।
māṇēṇa pavasaṇēṇa ya pañcavihaṁ jhijjaē pēmmaṁ ॥ 18 ॥
addaṁsaṇēṇa bālaya suṭṭhu vi nēhāṇubaddhamaṇasāṇaṁ ।
hatthaüḍapāṇiyāi va kālēṇa galanti pēmmāṇi ॥ 19 ॥
pēmmassa virōhiyasandhiyassa paccakkhadiṭṭhaviliyassa ।
uyayassa va tāviyasīyalassa virasō rasō hōi ॥ 20 ॥
tāva ya putti chaïllō1 jāva na pēmmassa gōyarē paḍaï ।
nēhēṇa navari chēyattaṇassa mūlā khaṇijjanti ॥ 21 ॥
aliyapayampiri aṇimittakōvaṇē asuṇi suṇasu maha vayaṇaṁ ।
ēkkaggāhiṇi sōkkhēkkabandhavaṁ galaï tāruṇṇaṁ ॥ 1 ॥
agghāhi mahuṁ dē gēṇha candaṇaṁ asuṇi suṇasu maha vayaṇaṁ ।
māṇēṇa mā naḍijjasu māṇaṁsiṇi galaï chaṇarāī ॥ 2 ॥
ē daïi maha pasijjasu māṇaṁ mōttūṇa kuṇasu pasiōsaṁ ।
kayasēharāṇa summaï ālāvō jhatti gōsammi ॥ 3 ॥
niddābhaṅgō āvaṇḍurattaṇaṁ dīharā ya nīsāsā ।
jāyanti jassa virahē tēṇa samaṁ kērisō māṇō ॥ 4 ॥
naïpūrasacchahē jōvvaṇammi diyahēsu niccapahiēsu ।
aṇiyattāsu vi rāīsu putti kiṁ daḍḍhamāṇēṇa ॥ 5 ॥
jaï māṇō kīsa piō ahava piō kīsa kīraē māṇō ।
māṇiṇi dō vi gaïndā ēkkakkhambhē na bajjhanti ॥ 6 ॥
māṇiṇi muēsu māṇaṁ jaï vi piō suṭṭhu vallahō tujjha ।
kāraṇavasēṇa kūvō na namaï muddhē tulā namaï ॥ 7 ॥
māṇaṁ avalambantī marihisi muddhē vasantamāsammi ।
māṇō puṇō vi kijjaï chapadiyahā dullahā hunti ॥ 8 ॥
mā putti kuṇasu māṇaṁ daïō hiyayammi niṭṭhurasahāvō ।
kandalisarisaṁ pēmmaṁ ḍhasatti tuṭṭaṁ na saṅghaḍaï ॥ 9 ॥
daḍhaṇēhaṇālaparisaṇṭhiyassa sabbhāvadalasuyandhassa ।
pēmmuppalassa māē māṇatusārō cciya viṇāsō ॥ 10 ॥
muya māṇaṁ māṇa piyaṁ piyasarayaṁ jāva vaccaē sarayaṁ ।
saraē sarayaṁ surayaṁ ca putti kō pāvaï aüṇṇō ॥ 11 ॥
tuṅgō thirō visālō jō raïō māṇapavvaō tīē ।
sō daïyadiṭiṭhavajjāsaṇissa ghāyaṁ ciya na pattō ॥ 12 ॥
pāyavaḍiō na gaṇiō piyaṁ bhaṇantō vi vippiyaṁ bhaṇiō ।
vaccantō na niruddhō bhaṇa kassa kaē kaō māṇō ॥ 13 ॥
māṇaṁ hu tammi kijjaï jō jāṇaï virahavēyaṇādukkhaṁ ।
aṇarasiyaṇivvisēsē kiṁ kīraï pattharē māṇō ॥ 14 ॥
ujjaggirassa taṇuyattaṇassa susiyassa dīharuṇṇassa ।
ēyāṇa uraṁ dāruṇa putti māṇaṁ kuṇijjāsu ॥ 15 ॥
kallaṁ kira kharahiyaō pavasihii piō tti suvvaï jaṇammi
taha vaḍḍha bhayavaï nisē jaha sē kallaṁ ciya na hōi ॥ 1 ॥
jaï vaccasi vacca tumaṁ kō vāraïḥtujjha suhava1 jantassa ।
tuha gamaṇaṁ maha maraṇaṁ lihiya pasatthī kayantēṇa ॥ 2 ॥
jaï vaccasi vacca tumaṁ ēṇhiṁ avaūhaṇēṇa na hu kajjaṁ ।
pāvāsiyāṇa maḍayaṁ chiviūṇa amaṅgalaṁ hōi ॥ 3 ॥
vasiūṇa majjha hiyaē jīyaṁ gahiūṇa ajja caliō si ।
sahavāsaharaviḍambaṇa gaṅgammi gaō na sujjhihisi ॥ 4 ॥
jaï vaccasi vacca tumaṁ añcala gahiō ya kuppasē kīsa ।
paḍhamaṁ ciya sō muccaï jō jīvaï tuha viōēṇa ॥ 5 ॥
na maē ruṇṇaṁ na kayaṁ amaṅgalaṁ hōntu sayalasiddhīō ।
virahaggidhūmakaḍuyāiyāi1 payalanti nayaṇāiṁ ॥ 6 ॥
rē sasivāhaṇavāhaṇa mā pavasasu ērisammi kālammi ।
sēlasuyāsuyavāhaṇaghaṇasaddō jattha ucchalaï ॥ 7 ॥
rē sasivāhaṇavāhaṇa vārijjantō na ṭhāsi jaï suhaya ।
tā lacchivāsavāsaṁ amhāṇaṁ vacca dāūṇa ॥ 8 ॥
iha panthē mā vaccasu gayavaï bhaṇiyaṁ bhuyaṁ pasārēvi ।
panthiya piyapayamuddā maïlijjaï tujjha gamaṇēṇa ॥ 9 ॥
ajjaṁ cēya paütthō ujjāgaraō jaṇassa ajjēya ।
ajjēya haladdīpiñjarāi gōlāi tūhāiṁ ॥ 1 ॥
ajjaṁ cēya paütthō ajjaṁ ciya sunnayāi jāyāiṁ ।
racchāmuhadēulacaccarāi amhaṁ ca hiyayāiṁ ॥ 2 ॥
ajjaṁ ciya tēṇa viṇā imīi āyambadhavalakasaṇāiṁ ।
jaccandhamōttiyāi va disāsu ghōlanti nayaṇāiṁ ॥ 3 ॥
ajjaṁ gaō tti ajjaṁ gaō tti ajjaṁ gaōtti lihirīē ।
paḍhama cciya diyahaddhē kuḍḍō rēhāhi cittaliō ॥ 4 ॥
avahidiyahāgamāsaṅkirīhi sahiyāhi tīi lihirīē ।
dō tinni taha cciya cōriyāi rēhā phusijjanti ॥ 5 ॥
'kaïyā gaō piō', 'putti ajja', 'ajjēva' kaï diṇā hōnti' ।
'ēkkō', 'ēddahamēttō' bhaṇiuṁ mōhaṁ gayā bālā ॥ 6 ॥
taha kaha vi kummuhuttē niyaṭṭaī vallahō jiyantāṇaṁ ।
jaha phuḍiyasippisampuḍadalaṁ va bīyaṁ na saṅghaḍaï ॥ 7 ॥
virahēṇa mandarēṇa va hiyayaṁ duddhōdarhi va mahiūṇa ।
ummūliyāi avvō amhaṁ rayaṇāi va suhāiṁ ॥ 8 ॥
ajjaṁ puṇṇā avahī karēsu muhamaṇḍaṇaṁ payattēṇa ।
ajja samappaï virahō intē vi piē aïntē1 vi ॥ 9 ॥
khaṇamēttaṁ santāvō sēō sīyaṁ tahēva rōmañcō ।
avvō dūsahaṇijjō piyavirahō saṁṇivāō vva ॥ 10 ॥
uṇhuṇhā raṇaraṇayā duppēcchā dūsahā durālōyā ।
saṁvaccharasayasarisā piyavirahē duggamā diyahā ॥ 11 ॥
mayaṇāṇilasandhukkhiyaṇēhindhaṇadusahadūrapajjaliō ।
ḍahaī sahi piyavirahō jalaṇō jalaṇō cciya varāō ॥ 12 ॥
thōraṁsusalilasittō hiyaē pajjalaï piyaviōyammi ।
virahō halē hayāsō aüvvajalaṇō kaō vihiṇā ॥ 13 ॥
visaharavisaggisaṁsaggadūsiō ḍahaï candaṇō ḍahaü ।
piyavirahē mahacōjjaṁ amayamaō jaṁ sasī ḍahaï ॥ 14 ॥
ōsarasu mayaṇa ghēttūṇa jīviyaṁ harahuyāsaṇuccariyaṁ1 ।
piyavirahajalaṇajālāvalīhi sahasa tti ḍajjhihisi ॥ 15 ॥
jēhiṁ sōhaggaṇihī diṭṭhō nayaṇēhi tē cciṁya ruvantu ।
aṅgāi apāviyasaṅgamāi tā kīsa jhijjanti ॥ 16 ॥
annō3 kō vi sahāvō vammahasihiṇō halā hayāsassa ।
vijjhāi nīrasāṇaṁ hiyaē sarasāṇa pajjalaï ॥ 1 ॥
diṭṭhī diṭiṭhappasarō pasarēṇa raī raīi sabbhāvō ।
sabbhāvēṇa ya nēhō pañca vi bāṇā aṇaṅgassa ॥ 2 ॥
uvari mahaṁ ciya vammaha pañca vi bāṇā nisaṁsa rē mukkā ।
annaṁ uṇa taruṇijaṇaṁ kiṁ haṇihisi cāvalaṭṭhīē ॥ 3 ॥
icchāṇiyattapasarō kāmō kulabāliyāṇa kiṁ kuṇaï ।
sīhō vva pañjaragaō aṅga cciya jhijjaï varāō ॥ 4 ॥
ē kusumasarā tuha ḍajjhihinti mā bhaṇasu mayaṇa na hu bhaṇiyaṁ ।
piyavirahatāvataviē maha hiyaē pakkhivantassa ॥ 5 ॥
maïrā mayaṅkakiraṇā mahumāsō kāmiṇīṇa ullāvō1 ।
pañcamasarassa gēō talavaggō kāmadēvassa ॥ 6 ॥
vammaha pasaṁsaṇijjō si vandaṇijjō si guṇamahagghō si ।
gōrī harassa dēhaddhavāsiṇī jēṇa nimmaviyā ॥ 7 ॥
saccaṁ aṇaṅga kōyaṇḍavāvaḍō sarapahuttalakkhō si ।
taruṇīcalantalōyaṇapuraō jaï kuṇasi sandhāṇaṁ ॥ 8 ॥
kaha sā na sambhalijjaï jattha vi nivasanti pañca vatthūṇi ।
vīṇāvaṁsālāvaṇipārāvayakōilālaviyaṁ ॥ 1 ॥
kaha sā na sambhalijjaï jā sā attattakaṇayataṇusōhā ।
tivalītaraṅgamajjhā haraï maṇaṁ varamaïndāṇaṁ ॥ 2 ॥
kaha sā na sambhalijjaï jā sā navaṇaliṇikōmalā bālā ।
kararuha taṇu chippantī akāla ghaṇabhaddavaṁ kuṇaï ॥ 3 ॥
kaha sā na sambhalijjaï jā sā gharabāratōraṇaṇisaṇṇā ।
hariṇi vva jūhabhaṭṭhā acchaï maggaṁ palōyantī1 ॥ 4 ॥
kaha sā na sambhalijjaï jā sā nīsāsasōsiyasarīrā ।
āsāsijjaï sāsā jāva na sāsā samappanti ॥ 5 ॥
muharāō cciya payaḍaï jō jassa piō kimēttha bhaṇiēṇa ।
sāhēi aṅgaṇaṁ ciya gharassa abbhantarē lacchiṁ ॥ 1 ॥
ḍajjhanti kaḍhanti samūsasanti ō māi simisimāyanti ।
jīvanti jīvasēsā jē ramiyā pōḍhamahilāhiṁ ॥ 2 ॥
kampanti valanti samūsasanti ō māi simisimāyanti ।
aṅgāi tassa puraō na yāṇimō kaha dharijjanti ॥ 3 ॥
nīsasiukkampiyapulaïēhi jāṇanti nacciuṁ dhannā ।
amhārisīṇa diṭṭhē piyammi appā vi vīsaraï ॥ 4 ॥
acchaü tā phaṁsasuhaṁ amayarasāō vi dūraramaṇijjaṁ ।
daṁsaṇamēttēṇa vi piyayamassa bhaṇa kiṁ na pajjattaṁ ॥ 5 ॥
acchaü tā lōyaṇagōyarammi paḍiēṇa tēṇa jaṁ sōkkhaṁ ।
āyaṇṇiē vi piyasahi piē jaṇē hōi nivvāṇaṁ ॥ 6 ॥
hatthapphaṁsēṇa vi piyayamassa jā hōi sōkkha sampattī ।
sā sarabhasagāḍhāligiē vi iyarē jaṇē kattō ॥ 7 ॥
tā kiṁ karēmi māē lōyaṇajuyalassa hayasahāvassa ।
ēkkaṁ mōttūṇa piyaṁ lakkhēvi na lakkhaē lakkhaṁ ॥ 8 ॥
tā kiṁ karēmi piyasahi piyassa sōhaggabhārabhamirassa ।
rāyaṅgaṇaṁ va khubbhaï jassa gharaṁ duisaṅghēhiṁ ॥ 9 ॥
taha tēṇa vi sā diṭṭhā tīē taha tassa pēsiyā diṭṭhī ।
jaha dōṇha vi samayaṁ ciya nivvattarayāi jāyāiṁ ॥ 10 ॥
dūi tumaṁ ciya kusalā kakkhaḍamaüyāi jāṇasē vōttuṁ ।
kaṇḍuiyapaṇḍuraṁ jaha na hōi taha taṁ kuṇijjāsu ॥ 1 ॥
kittiyamēttaṁ ēyaṁ ēsāvatthā u sahi sarīrassa ।
mahilā mahilāṇa gaī jaṁ jāṇasi taṁ kuṇijjāsu ॥ 2 ॥
jaṁ tuha kajjaṁ bhaṇa taṁ maha tti jaṁ jāṇiuṁ bhaṇējjāsu ।
ō dūi saccavayaṇēṇa taṁ si pāraṁ gayā ajja ॥ 3 ॥
tilayaṁ vilayaṁ vivarīya kañcuyaṁ sēyabhinna savvaṅgaṁ ।
paḍivayaṇaṁ alahantī dūī kaliūṇa sā hasiyā ॥ 4 ॥
jaï sō na ēi gēhaṁ tā dūi ahōmuhī tumaṁ kīsa ।
sō hōhī majjha piō jō tujjha na khaṇḍaē vayaṇaṁ ॥ 5 ॥
dūi samāgamasēullayaṅgi daralhasiyasicayadhammillē ।
thaṇajahaṇakavōlaṇahakkhaēhi nāyā si jaha paḍiyā ॥ 6 ॥
iya rakkhasāṇa vi phuḍaṁ dūi na khajjanti dūiyā1 lōē ।
aha ērisī avatthā gayāṇa amhaṁ vasē jāyā ॥ 7 ॥
acchaü tāva savibbhamakaḍakkhavikkhēvajampirī dūī ।
taggāmakuḍilasuṇahillayā vi diṭṭhā suhāvēi ॥ 8 ॥
vēllahalālāvaviyakkhaṇāu aḍayaṇapaüttiharaṇāō ।
sō raṇṇō nō gāmō jattha na dō tinni dūīō ॥ 9 ॥
tuha gōttāyaṇṇaṇaviyaḍaramaṇapajjhariyarasajalēṇaṁ va ।
raïmandirammi bālā abbhukkhantī paribbhamaï ॥ 1 ॥
tuha saṅgamadōhaliṇīi tīi sōhaggavimbhiyāsāē ।
navasiyasayāi dēntīi suhaya dēvā vi na hu pattā ॥ 2 ॥
tuha annēsaṇakajjammi suhaya sā harisaviyasiyakavōlā ।
jaṁ jattha natthi taṁ tattha maggamāṇī ciraṁ bhamiyā ॥ 3 ॥
agaṇiyasēsajuvāṇā bālaya vōlīṇalōyamajjāyā ।
aha sā bhamaï disāmuhapasāpiyacchī tuha kaēṇa ॥ 4 ॥
nayaṇāi tuha viōē ghōlirabāhāi suhaya taṇuīē ।
hiyayaṭṭhiyasōyahuyāsadhūmabhariyāi va galanti ॥ 5 ॥
vaïmaggapēsiyāiṁ tīē nayaṇāi tammi vōlīṇē ।
ajja vi galanti paḍilaggakaṇṭayāi vva ō suhaya ॥ 6 ॥
sambhariūṇa ya ruṇṇaṁ tīi tumaṁ taha vimukkapukkāraṁ ।
niddaya jaha suhiyassa vi jaṇassa ō nivaḍiō bāhō ॥ 7 ॥
ēkkēkkamavaïvēḍhiyavivarantarataraladinnaṇayaṇāē ।
taï vōlantē bālaya pañjarasaüṇāiyaṁ tīē ॥ 8 ॥
nayaṇabbhantaraghōlantabāhabharamantharāi diṭṭhīē ।
puṇaruttapēcchirīē bālaya tā kiṁ na bhaṇiō si ॥ 9 ॥
suhaya gayaṁ tuha virahē tissā hiyayaṁ pavēviraṁ ajja ।
karicalaṇacampaṇucchaliyatucchatōyaṁ miva disāsu ॥ 10 ॥
sā taï sahatthadinnaṁ ajja vi ō suhaya gandharahiyaṁ pi ।
uvvasiyaṇayaragharadēvaya vva ōmālayaṁ1 vahaï ॥ 11 ॥
taha jhīṇā tuha virahē aṇudiyahaṁ sundaraṅga taṇuyaṅgī ।
jaha siḍhilavalayaṇivaḍaṇabhaēṇa ubbhiyakarā bhamaï ॥ 12 ॥
tuha virahatāviyāē tissā bālāi thaṇaharucchaṅgē ।
dijjantī aṇudiyahaṁ muṇālamālā chamacchamaï ॥ 13 ॥
sā tujjha kaē gayamayavilēvaṇā taha vaṇēkkasāhārā ।
jāyā niddaya jāyā māsāhārā pulindi vva ॥ 14 ॥
hatthaṭiṭhayaṁ kavālaṁ na muyaï nūṇaṁ khaṇaṁ pi khaṭṭaṅgaṁ ।
sā tuha virahē bālaya bālā kāvāliṇī jāyā ॥ 15 ॥
taha jhīṇā jaha maüliyalōyaṇaüḍavihaḍaṇē vi asamatthā ।
sakkihiṁi dukkaraṁ gharagayaṁ pi daṭṭhuṁ tumaṁ bālā ॥ 16 ॥
nāhaṁ dūī na1 tumaṁ piō tti kō ēttha majjha vāvārō ।
sā marēi tujjha ajasō tti tēṇa dhammakkharaṁ bhaṇimō ॥ 17 ॥
bahusō vi kahijjantaṁ tuha vayaṇaṁ majjha hatthasandiṭṭhaṁ ।
na suyaṁ ti jampamāṇī puṇaruttasayaṁ kuṇaï ajjhā ॥2 18 ॥
majjhaṇhapatthiyassa vi gimhē pahiyassa haraï santāvaṁ ।
hiyayaṭṭhiyajāyāmuhamayaṅkajōṇhājaluppīlō1 ॥ 1 ॥
mā uṇhaṁ piyasu jalaṁ virahiṇivirahāṇalēṇa santattaṁ ।
ēttha sarē ē panthiva gayavaïvahuyāu majjaviyā ॥ 2 ॥
kō dēsō uvvasiō kō vasiō suhaa jattha caliō si ।
ō pahiya panthadīvaya puṇō tumaṁ kattha dīsihisi ॥ 3 ॥
diṭṭhō si jēhi panthiya jēhi na diṭrṭhō si bē vi tē musiyā ।
ēkkāṇa hiyayaharaṇaṁ annāṇa vi nipphalaṁ jammaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
kharapavaṇacāḍucālirakaṇṭhaṭriṭhayadinnakappaḍō pahiō ।
daïyādaṁsaṇaturiō addhuḍḍīṇō vva paḍihāi ॥ 5 ॥
daïyādaṁsaṇa tiṇhāluyassa pahiyassa ciraṇiyattassa ।
nayarāsannē dhukkōḍiyā vi hiyaē na māyanti ॥ 6 ॥
tē dhannā garuyaṇiyambabimbabhārālasāhi taruṇīhiṁ ।
phuriyāharadaragaggaragirāhi jē sambharijjanti ॥ 1 ॥
tē dhannā kaḍhiṇuttuṅgathōrathaṇavīḍhabhāriyaṅgīhiṁ ।
sabbhāvaṇēhaükkaṇṭhirīhi jē sambharijjanti ॥ 2 ॥
tē dhannā tāṇa namō tē cciya jīvanti vabhmahapasāyā ।
īsilhasantaṇīvīulāhi jē sambharijjanti ॥ 3 ॥
tē dhannā samayagaïndalīlalīlāyarīhi aṇavarayaṁ ।
chaṇavāsarasasaharavayaṇiyāhi jē sambharijjanti ॥ 4 ॥
jhijjaü hiyayaṁ phuṭṭantu lōyaṇā hōu ajja maraṇaṁ pi ।
mayaṇāṇalō viyambhaü mā māṇaṁ muñca rē hiyaya ॥ 1 ॥
hā hiyaya jhīṇasāhasa viyaliyamāhappacinta bhajjēsi ।
jattha gaō na gaṇijjasi tattha tumaṁ bandhasē nēhaṁ ॥ 2 ॥
hā hiyaya kiṁ kilammasi dullahajaṇagaruyasaṅgamāsāē ।
aghaḍantajuttikajjāṇubandhakaraṇē suhaṁ kattō ॥ 3 ॥
appacchandapahāvira dullahalāhaṁ jaṇaṁ vimaggantō1 ।
āyāsaṁ va bhamantō muha vva kēṇāvi khajjihisi ॥ 4 ॥
ḍajjhasi ḍajjhasu kaḍḍhasi kaḍḍhasu aha phuḍāsi hiyaya tā phuḍasu ।
jēṇa puṇō na kayāi ya annāsattē maïṁ kuṇāsi ॥ 5 ॥
bhuñjaï bhuñjiyasēsaṁ suppaï suttammi1 pariyaṇē sayalē ।
paḍhamaṁ cēya vibujjhaï gharassa lacchī na sā ghariṇī ॥ 1 ॥
tucchaṁ tavaṇiṁ pi gharē ghariṇī taha kaha vi nēi vitthāraṁ ।
jaha tē vi bandhavā jalaṇihi vva thāhaṁ na yāṇanti ॥ 2 ॥
duggayagharammi ghariṇī rakkhantī āulattaṇaṁ païṇō ।
pucchiyadōhalasaddhā uyayaṁ ciya dōhalaṁ kahaï ॥ 3 ॥
pattē piyapāhuṇaē maṅgalavalayāi vikkiṇantīē ।
duggayaghariṇīkulavāliyāi rōvāviō gāmō ॥ 4 ॥
bandhavamaraṇē vi hahā duggayaghariṇīi vi na tahā ruṇṇaṁ ।
appattabalivilakkhē vallahakāē samuḍḍīṇē ॥ 5 ॥
amuṇiyapiyamaraṇāē vāyasamuḍḍāvirīi ghariṇīē ।
rōvāvijjaï gāmō aṇudiyahaṁ baddhavēṇīē ॥ 6 ॥
ḍimbhāṇa bhuttasēsaṁ chuhākilantā vi dēi duhiyāṇaṁ ।
kulagōravēṇa varaīu rōraghariṇīu jhijjanti ॥ 7 ॥
ahiyāimāṇiṇō duggayassa chāhiṁ païssa rakkhantī ।
niyabandhavāṇa jūraï ghariṇī vihavēṇa pattāṇaṁ ॥ 8 ॥
ubbhēu aṅguliṁ sā vilayā jā maha païṁ na kāmēi ।
sō kō vi jampaü juvā jassa maē pōsiyā diṭṭhī ॥ 1 ॥
caccaraghariṇī piyadaṁsaṇā vi taruṇī paütthavaïyā vi ।
asaīsaïjjhiyā1 duggayā vi na hu khaṇḍiyaṁ sīlaṁ ॥ 2 ॥
asarisacittē diyarē suddhamaṇā piyayamē visamasīlē ।
na kahaï kuḍumbavihaḍaṇabhaēṇa taṇuyāyaē muddhā ॥ 3 ॥
gharavāvārē ghariṇī vēsā surayammi kulabahū suyaṇē ।
pariṇaïmajjhammi sahī vihurē manti vva bhiccō vva ॥ 4 ॥
kulavāliyāi pēcchaha jōvvaṇalāvaṇṇavibbhamavilāsā ।
savvē vi aggacaliyā piyammi kayaṇicchaē gantuṁ ॥ 5 ॥
purisavisēsēṇa saïttaṇāi na kulakkamēma mahilāṇaṁ ।
saggaṁ gaē vi hālē na muyaï gōlā païṭṭhāṇaṁ ॥ 6 ॥
ihaparalōyaviruddhēṇa kaṇṇakaḍuēṇa garahaṇijjēṇa ।
ubhayakuladūsaṇijjēṇa dūi kiṁ tēṇa bhamiēṇa ॥ 7 ॥
jaï sō guṇāṇurāī guṇannuō maha guṇē pasaṁsēi ।
paḍhamaṁ ciya jaï asaī guṇagaṇaṇā kā taha ccēya ॥ 8 ॥
jaï uttamō1 vi bhaṇṇaï maha puraō sō vi suyaṇu aṇudiyahaṁ ।
māmi na uttama1purisā parassa dārāi pēcchanti ॥ 9 ॥

div.head: asaīvajjā asatīpaddhatiḥ

lg.l: niyaḍakuḍaṅgaṁ1 pacchannadēulaṁ bahujuvāṇasaṅkiṇṇaṁ ।
thērō paï tti mā ruvasu putti dinnā si suggāmē ॥ 1 ॥
mā ruvasu ōṇayamuhī dhavalāyantēsu sālichēttēsu ।
hariyālamaṇḍiyamuhā naḍa vva saṇavāḍayā jāyā ॥ 2 ॥
pavvēṇa saṇaṁ pacchēṇa vañjulā dāhiṇēṇa vaḍaviḍavō ।
puttii puṇṇēhi viṇā na labbhaē ērisō gāmō ॥ 3 ॥
pēkkhaha mahāṇucōjjaṁ kāṇādhariṇīi jaṁ kayaṁ kajjaṁ ।
cumbēvi1 na lahu nayaṇaṁ jhaḍatti2 nīsāriō jārō ॥ 4 ॥
paürajuvāṇō gāmō mahumāsō jōvvaṇaṁ paī thērō ।
juṇṇasurā sāhīṇā asaī mā hōu kiṁ maraü ॥ 5 ॥
dēvāṇa bambhaṇāṇa ya putti pasāēṇa ēttiyaṁ kālaṁ ।
na hu jāō amha gharē kaïyā vi saïttaṇakalaṅkō ॥ 6 ॥
saṭṭhīi hōi suhavā saēṇa rambhattaṇaṁ ca pāvēi ।
puṇṇē jārasahassē indō addhāsaṇaṁ dēha ॥ 7 ॥
jaï phuḍu ēttha muyāṇaṁ jammaphalaṁ hōi kiṁ pi amhāṇaṁ ।
tā tēsu kuḍaṅgēsu ha1 tēṇa samaṁ taha nu kīlējjā ॥ 8 ॥
jō jaṁ karēi pāvaï sō taṁ sōūṇa niggayā asaī ।
ramiyavvaṁ tēṇa samaṁ tattha jaïcchāi tā ēṇhiṁ ॥ 9 ॥
asaīhi saī bhaṇiyā nihuyaṁ hōūṇa kaṇṇamūlammi ।
narayaṁ vaccasi pāvē parapurisarasaṁ ayāṇantī ॥ 10 ॥
jattha na khujjayaviḍavō na naī na vaṇaṁ na ujjaḍō gēhō ।
tattha bhaṇa kaha vasijjaï suvisatthavivajjiē gāmē ॥ 11 ॥
rē rē viḍappa mā muyasu dujjaṇaṁ gilasu puṇṇimāyandaṁ ।
amayamayaṁ bhuñjantō hayāsa dīhāuō hōsi ॥ 12 ॥
chinnaṁ puṇō vi chijjaü mahumahacakkēṇa rāhuṇō sīsaṁ ।
giliō jēṇa vimukkō asaīṇaṁ dūsaō candō ॥ 13 ॥

div.p: 485) taṁ kiṁ pi kaha vi hōhii labbhaï puhaviṁ vi hiṇḍamāṇēhiṁ । jēṇōsahēṇa candō jīrijjaï puṇṇimāsahiō ॥ 14 ॥

lg.l: kiṁ vihiṇā suralōē ēkkā vi na puṁsali tti nimmaviyā ।
sāhīṇō jēṇa sasī na bōliō nīlaraṅgammi ॥ 15 ॥
pasaraï jēṇa tamōhō phiṭṭaï candassa candimā jēṇa ।
taṁ siddha sumari siripavvayāu āṇōsahaṁ kiṁ pi ॥ 16 ॥
mā pattiyaṁ pi dijjasu puṁsali siviṇē vi kāmaḍahaṇassa ।
jō amhāṇa amittaṁ candaṁ sīsē samuvvahaï ॥ 17 ॥
asaīṇaṁ vippiya rē gavvaṁ mā vahasu puṇṇimāyanda ।
dīsihisi tumaṁ kaïyā jaha bhaggō valayakhaṇḍō vva ॥ 18 ॥
avvō dhāvasu turiyaṁ kajjala bhariūṇa bē vi hatthāiṁ ।
diṭṭhō kūvāvaḍiō asaīṇaṁ dūsaō1 candō ॥ 19 ॥
maha ēsi kīsa panthiya jaï harasi niyaṁsaṇaṁ niyambāō ।
sāhēmi kassa puraō gāmō dūrē ahaṁ ēkkā ॥ 20 ॥
attā bahirandhaliyā2 bahuvihavīvāhasaṅkulō gāmō ।
majjha paī ya viēsē kō tujjha vasērayaṁ dēi ॥ 21 ॥
jaṇasaṅkulaṁ na sunnaṁ rūsaï attā na dēi ōāsaṁ ।
tā vacca pahiya mā magga vāsayaṁ ēttha majjha gharē ॥ 22 ॥
kaha labbhaï sattharayaṁ amhāṇaṁ pahiya pāmaragharammi ।
unnayapaōharē pēcchiūṇa jaï vasasi tā vasasu ॥ 23 ॥
vasa pahiya aṅgaṇa cciya phiṭṭaü tā tujjha vasaṇadōhalaō ।
iha gāmē hēmantō navaraṁ gimhassa sāricchō ॥ 24 ॥
ittō nivasaï attā ēttha ahaṁ ēttha pariyaṇō sayalō ।
ē pahiya rattiandhaya mā maha sayaṇē nimajjihisi ॥ 25 ॥
dīharakhaḍiyāhatthō jōisiō bhamaï nayaramajjhammi ।
jāṇaï sukkassa gaïṁ gaṇaï jaï gaṇāvaē kō vi ॥ 1 ॥
jōisiya mā vilambasu khaḍiyaṁ ghēttūṇa gaṇasu maha turiyaṁ ।
aṅgāraē paṇaṭṭhē sukkassa gaī taha ccēya ॥ 2 ॥
atthi ghara cciya gaṇaō vicittakaraṇēhi niṭṭhuraṁ gaṇaï ।
na hu jāṇaï sukkagaïṁ tēṇāhaṁ tuha gharē pattā ॥ 3 ॥
jōisiya kīsa cukkasi vicittakaraṇāi jāṇamāṇō vi ।
taha kaha vi kuṇasu sigghaṁ jaha sukkaṁ niccalaṁ hōi ॥ 4 ॥
vivarīē raïbimbē nakkhattāṇaṁ ca ṭhāṇagahiyāṇaṁ ।
na paḍaï jalassa bindū sundari cittaṭiṭhaē sukkē ॥ 5 ॥
viulaṁ phalayaṁ thōrā salāyayā1 tuṁ pi gaṇaya kusalō si ।
taha vi na āō sukkō saccaṁ ciya sunnahiyaō si ॥ 6 ॥
ḍajjhaü sō jōisiō vicittakaraṇāi jāṇamāṇō vi ।
gaṇiuṁ sayavāraṁ mē uṭṭhaï dhūmō gaṇantassa ॥ 7 ॥
jaï gaṇasi puṇō vi tumaṁ vicittakaraṇēhi gaṇaya savisēsaṁ ।
sukkakkamēṇa2 rahiyaṁ na hu laggaṁ sōhaṇaṁ hōi ॥ 8 ॥
mōttūṇa karaṇagaṇiyaṁ aṅgulimēttēṇa jaï vi sō gaṇaï ।
aïṇiuṇō jōisiō kaḍḍhaï nāḍīgayaṁ sukkaṁ ॥ 9 ॥
bhaṇiō vi jaï na kuppasi jaï na tumaṁ hōsi kūḍajōisiō ।
tā kīsa tujjha jāyā annēhi gaṇāvaē diyahaṁ ॥ 10 ॥
aṅgārayaṁ na yāṇaï na hu bujjhaï hatthacittasañcāraṁ ।
iya māi kūḍagaṇaō kaha jāṇaï sukkasañcāraṁ ॥ 11 ॥
masi maliūṇa na yāṇasi lēhaṇi gahiūṇa mūḍha khaliō si ।
ōsarasu kūḍalēhaya sulaliyapattaṁ viṇāsihisi ॥ 1 ॥
ḍhaliyā ya masī bhaggā ya lēhaṇī kharaḍiyaṁ ca talavaṭṭaṁ ।
dhiddhitti kūḍalēhaya ajja vi lēhattaṇē taṇhā ॥ 2 ॥
pihulaṁ masibhāyaṇayaṁ atthi masī vittharaṁ ca talavaṭṭaṁ ।
amhārisāṇa kajjē hayalēhaya lēhaṇī bhaggā ॥ 3 ॥
vijja na ēsō jaraō na ya vāhī ēsa kō vi sambhūō ।
uvasamaï salōṇēṇaṁ viḍaṅgajōyāmayarasēṇaṁ ॥ 1 ॥
saccaṁ jaraē kusalō sarasuppannaṁ ya lakkhasē vāhiṁ ।
ēyaṁ puṇō vi aṅgaṁ vijja viḍaṅgēhi pannattaṁ ॥ 2 ॥
pukkārayaṁ paüñjasu bālāi rasubbhavāi vāhīē ।
ajjaṁ aṇajja nillajja vijja pējjāi na hu kajjaṁ ॥ 3 ॥
sāmā khāmā na sahēi maddaṇaṁ vijja kiṁ viyappēṇaṁ ।
aggaṅgulīi dijjaü avalēhō māuliṅgassa ॥ 4 ॥
pukkāraēṇa vijjaya nivviṇṇā tuha ya dīhasāsēṇa ।
mā vārijjaü bālā bhuñjaü annaṁ jahicchāē ॥ 5 ॥
gahavaïsuēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ aüvvavijjattaṇaṁ hayāsēṇaṁ
jēṇa paüñjaï pukkārayaṁ pi pannattiyāṇaṁ pi ॥ 6 ॥
vijja tuhāgamaṇa cciya mukkā jaraēṇa kiṁ na parimuṇasi ।
tā niyasu majjha aṅgē sampaï sēō samuppannō ॥ 7 ॥
vijjaya annaṁ vāraṁ maha jaraō sayaraēṇa pannattō ।
jaï taṁ1 nēcchasi dāuṁ tā kiṁ chāsī vi mā hōu ॥ 8 ॥
bālaṁ jarāvilaṅgiṁ kalamahurapalāviṇiṁ niyantassa ।
vijjassa sūsuō sūsuō vi sahasatti pannaṭṭhō ॥ 9 ॥
mōttūṇa bālatantaṁ taha ya vasīkaraṇamantatantēhiṁ ।
siddhatthēhi mahammaï taruṇī taruṇēṇa vijjēṇa ॥ 10 ॥
annaṁ na ruccaï cciya majjha piyāsāi pūriyaṁ hiyayaṁ ।
nēhasurayallayaṅgē tuha surayaṁ vijja paḍihāi ॥ 11 ॥
jō dhammiō na pāvaï kurayaṁ mandārayaṁ ca muggarayaṁ ।
sō gahiyakaraṇḍō cciya kattō dhuttīrayaṁ1 lahaï ॥ 1 ॥
dhuttīraēṇa dhammiya jaï icchasi liṅgapūraṇaṁ kāuṁ ।
tā ējjasu majjha 2parōhaḍammi sūrammi atthamiē ॥ 2 ॥
dhuttīrayassa kajjē gahirāṇi parōhaḍāi vaccantō ।
dhammiya suraṅgakāō kurayāṇa vi navari cukkihisi ॥ 3 ॥
dhuttīrayāṇa kajjēṇa dhammiō paraparōhaḍē bhamaï ।
annēhi viluppantaṁ niyayārāmaṁ na lakkhēi ॥ 4 ॥
ghēttūṇa karaṇḍaṁ bhamaï vāvaḍō paraparōhaḍē nūṇaṁ ।
dhuttīraēsu rattō ēkkaṁ pi na mēllaē dhammī ॥ 5 ॥
sulahāi parōhaḍasaṇṭhiyāi dhuttīrayāṇi mōttūṇaṁ ।
kurayāṇa kaē raṇṇaṁ pēcchaha kaha dhammiō bhamaï ॥ 6 ॥
kañcīraēhi kaṇavīraēhi dhuttīraēhi bahuēhi ।
jaï icchasi dēharayaṁ dhammiya tā maha gharē ējja ॥ 7 ॥
mandārayaṁ vivajjaï kurayaṁ pariharaï cayaï bhaṅgarayaṁ ।
dhuttīrayamalahantō gahiyakaraṇḍō gaṇō bhamaï ॥ 8 ॥
viyasiyamuhāi vaṇṇujjalāi mayarandapāyaḍillāiṁ ।
dhuttīrayāi dhammiya puṇṇēhi viṇā na labbhanti ॥ 9 ॥
ēkkēṇa vi jaha dhuttīraēṇa liṅgassa uvari laggēṇa ।
mandārayāṇa dhammiya kōḍīi na taṁ suhaṁ hōi ॥ 10 ॥
sisiramayarandapajjharaṇapaürapasarantaparimalullāiṁ ।
kaṇavīrayāi gēṇhasu dhabhmiya sabbhāvarattāiṁ ॥ 11 ॥
jantiya gulaṁ vimaggasi na ya mē icchāi vāhasē jantaṁ ।
arasanna kiṁ na yāṇasi na rasēṇa viṇā gulaṁ hōi ॥ 1 ॥
viyaḍā vi jantavāyā maüō nālō rasāulō ucchū ।
laṭṭhī vi1 suppamāṇā kiṁ jantiya ūṇayaṁ vahasi ॥ 2 ॥
saddālayaṁ sarūvaṁ vitthiṇṇaṁ vararasaṁ sumaddasahaṁ ।
jaṁ2 ērisayaṁ jantaṁ tattha suhaṁ jantiō lahaï ॥ 3 ॥
taha jantiēṇa jantaṁ akkantaṁ nēhaṇibbhararasēṇa ।
jaha paḍhamaṁ ciya kuṇḍī bhariyā ēkkēṇa ghāēṇa ॥ 4 ॥
taṁ jantaṁ sā kuṇḍī sō ucchū bahalapattalacchāō ।
pīlāvaya tujjha guṇō ajja vi ūṇō rasō jāō ॥ 5 ॥
candaṇavaliyaṁ diḍhakañcibandhaṇaṁ dīharaṁ suparimāṇaṁ ।
hōi gharē sāhīṇaṁ musalaṁ dhannāṇa mahilāṇaṁ ॥ 1 ॥
thōragaruyāi 1sundarakañcījuttāi hunti niyagēhē ।
dhannāṇa mahiliyāṇaṁ ukkhalasarisāi musalāiṁ ॥ 2 ॥
muhabhāriyāi suṭṭhu vi suṭṭhu vi kañcīi diḍhanibaddhāiṁ ।
annāhiṁ pi hu juṇṇukkhalammi bhajjanti musalāiṁ ॥ 3 ॥
bhamiō ciraṁ asēsō gāmō maï sahiyaō sayaṁ vāraṁ ।
gēhukkhalaparimāṇēṇa māmi musalaṁ ciya na diṭṭhaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
bhaddamuhamaṇḍaṇaṁ ciya darapihulaṁ taha ya kañcisōhillaṁ ।
annēsiṁ piya1 musalaṁ paḍichandaṁ tēṇa vaccāmō ॥ 5 ॥
jassa tumaṁ aṇurattā sō tujjha ya mandahaṇēhaō putti ।
na hu dijjaï tālī dīharacchi ēkkēṇa hatthēṇa ॥ 1 ॥
jattha gaō tattha gaō sāmali sīhō na juppaï halammi ।
sappurisō vi taha cciya puṁsasu nayaṇāi mā ruṇṇaṁ ॥ 2 ॥
taïyā vārijjantī piyali1 païṁ ullirīhi acchīhiṁ ।
ēṇhiṁ virahāvatthaṁ puṇō vahantī kilāmihisi ॥ 3 ॥
mā ruvasu putti chēyāṇa aggaē khijjihinti nayaṇāiṁ ।
na hu khijjaï tāṇa maṇaṁ sēllaṁ miva salilapūrēṇaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
dāṇaṁ na dēnti bahulaṁ nēhaṁ darisanti nēya rajjanti ।
gēṇhanti na dēnti maṇaṁ putti cchēyā durārāhā ॥ 5 ॥
rajjanti1 nēya kassa vi rattā pasayacchi na hu virajjanti1 ।
diṇayarakara vva chēyā adiṭṭhadōsā vi rajjanti1 ॥ 6 ॥
rajjāvanti2 na rajjahim̐3 haranti hiyayaṁ na dēnti niyahiyayaṁ ।
chēyā bhuyaṅgasarisā ḍasiūṇa paraṁmuhā hōnti ॥ 7 ॥
rajjāvanti2 na rajjahim̐3 dēnti asōkkhaṁ na dukkhiyā hunti ॥
asuyaviṇaya tti ēṇhiṁ dukkhārāhā jaē chēyā ॥ 8 ॥
rattē rattā kasaṇammi kasaṇayā dhavalayammi taha dhavalā ।
phalihamaṇi vva chaïllā hunti jaṇē putti sampuṇṇā ॥ 9 ॥
darahasiyakaḍakkhaṇirikkhaṇāi siṅgārakammamasiṇāiṁ ।
ēyāi puṇō sikkhasu niruvamasōhaggadaïyāiṁ ॥ 1 ॥
maggantī mūliyamūliyāi mā bhamasu gharaharaṁ putti ।
chandāṇuvattaṇaṁ piyayamassa ēvaṁ vasītakaṇaṁ ॥ 2 ॥
bhūsaṇapasāhaṇāḍambarēhi mā khivasu1 putti appāṇaṁ ।
rañjijjaï jēṇa jaṇō anna cciya tē alaṅkārā ॥ 3 ॥
annāsattē vi piē ahiyayaraṁ āyaraṁ kuṇijjāsu ।
uddhacchi vēyaṇāi vi namanti cariyāi vi guṇēhiṁ ॥ 4 ॥
na viṇā sabbhāvēṇaṁ ghēppaï paramatthajāṇaō lōō ।
kō juṇṇamañjaraṁ kañjiēṇa vēyāriuṁ taraï ॥ 5 ॥
jēṇa viṇā na valijjaï1 aṇuṇijjaï sō kayāvarāhō vi ।
patta vi nayaradāhē bhaṇa kassa na vallahō aggī ॥ 6 ॥
avvō jāṇāmi ahaṁ tumha pasāēṇa cāḍuyasayāiṁ ।
ēkkaṁ navari na jāṇē niṇṇēhē2 ramaṇapajjharaṇaṁ ॥ 7 ॥
tāva cciya ḍhalahalayā jāva cciya nēhapūriyasarīrā ।
siddhatthā uṇa chēyā nēhavihūṇā khalīhunti ॥ 8 ॥
ahiṇi vva kuḍilagamaṇā rōraharē dīvaya vva niṇṇēhā ।
sukaï vva atthaluddhā vēsaṁ daṭaṭhūṇa vandāmi ॥ 1 ॥
vaṇṇaḍḍhā muharasiyā nēhavihūṇā vi laggaē kaṇṭhaṁ ।
pacchā karaï viyāraṁ balahaṭṭuyasārisā vēsā ॥ 2 ॥
sahaï salōhā ghaṇaghāyatāḍaṇaṁ taha ya bāṇasambandhaṁ ।
kuṇṭhi vva paürakuḍilā vēsā muṭṭhīi saṁvahaï ॥ 3 ॥
jāō piyaṁ piyaṁ paï ēkkaṁ vijjhāiṁ taṁ ciya palittaṁ ।
hōi avaraṭṭhiō cciya vēsāsatthō tiṇaggi vava ॥ 4 ॥
nimmalapavittahārā bahulōhā pulaïēṇa aṅgēṇa ।
khaggalaïya vva vēsā kōsēṇa viṇā na saṁvahaï ॥ 5 ॥
dhaṇasañcayā1 sugujjhā nibaddhalōhā bhuyaṅgamahaṇijjā ।
mañjūsiya vva vēsā ṭhāṇaṁ ciya lōhavittassa ॥ 6 ॥
na gaṇēi rūpavantaṁ na kulīṇaṁ nēya rūvasampannaṁ ।
vēsā vāṇarisarisā jattha phalaṁ tattha saṅkamaï ॥ 7 ॥
annannarāyarasiyaṁ āsannapaōharaṁ guṇavihūṇaṁ ।
ṭhaḍḍhaṁ sahāvavaṅkaṁ vēsāhiyayaṁ suradhaṇu vva ॥ 8 ॥
kavaḍēṇa ramanti jaṇaṁ piyaṁ payampanti atthalōhēṇa ।
tāṇa namō vēsāṇaṁ appā vi na vallahō jāṇa ॥ 9 ॥
kulalañchaṇaṁ akittī atthassa khaō asīlasaṁvāsō ।
gantuṁ ciya vēsaharaṁ na jujjaē paṇḍiyajaṇassa ॥ 10 ॥
sampattiyāi kālaṁ gamēsu sulahāi appamullāē ।
dēulavāḍayapattaṁ tuṭṭaṇa sīlaṁ aïmahagdhaṁ ॥ 11 ॥

attharahiō na ruccaï pañcakkhō kāmadēvō vi ॥ 12 ॥

appā vi jāṇa vēsō kō tāṇa parō piō hōi ॥ 13 ॥

annāṇa hunti dōsā vēsāṇa puṇō alaṅkārā ॥ 15 ॥
sarasā nihasaṇasārā gandhaḍḍhā bahubhuyaṅgaparimaliyā1 ।
candaṇalaya vva vēsā bhaṇa kassa na vallahā hōi ॥ 16 ॥
mā jāṇaha maha suhayaṁ vēsāhiyayaṁ samammaṇullāvaṁ ।
sēvālalittapattharasarisaṁ paḍaṇēṇa jāṇihisi ॥ 17 ॥

vēsā muṇisāricchā niccaṁ ciya kavaliyāhatthā ॥ 19 ॥
na hu kassa vi dēnti dhaṇaṁ annaṁ dēntaṁ pi taha nivāranti ।
atthā kiṁ kiviṇatthā satthāvatthā suyanti vva ॥ 1 ॥
nihaṇanti dhaṇaṁ dharaṇīyalammi iya jāṇiūṇa kiviṇajaṇā ।
pāyālē gantavvaṁ tā gacchaü aggaṭhāṇaṁ pi ॥ 2 ॥
kariṇō hariṇaharaviyāriyassa dīsanti mōttiyā kumbhē ।
kiviṇāṇa navari maraṇē payaḍa cciya hunti bhaṇḍārā ॥ 3 ॥
parimusaï karayalēṇa vi pēcchaï acchīhi taṁ sayā kiviṇō ।
ālihiyabhittibāullayaṁ va na hu bhuñjiuṁ taraï ॥ 4 ॥
pucchijjantā niyapariyaṇēṇa payaḍanti nēya taṁ atthaṁ ।
santaṁ pi dhaṇaṁ natthi tti jē bhaṇanti1 tē mahādhīrā ॥ 5 ॥
atthaṁ dharanti viyalā na dēnti pūyanti sayalabhūyāiṁ ।
puṇṇakkhaēṇa jhijjaï na sampayā cāyabhōēṇa ॥ 6 ॥
dēmi na kassa vi jampaï uddārajaṇassa viviharayaṇāiṁ ।
cāēṇa viṇā vi narō puṇō vi lacchīi pammukkō ॥ 1 ॥
chuhaï daḍhaṁ kuddālaṁ aïgamaṇē āulaṁ va pēllēi ।

sirajāṇuē1 niuttō uḍḍō hatthēṇa khaṇaṇakusalēṇa ।
kuddālēṇa ya rahiyaṁ kaha uḍḍō āṇaē uyayaṁ ॥ 2 ॥
niddayakuddālayamajjha2 bahulucchalantajalasōttaṁ ।
uḍḍō laddhappharisō bhariyaṁ pi na mēllaē vāviṁ ॥ 3 ॥
kuddālaghāyaghaṇatāḍaṇēṇa pajjharaï vasuha na hu cōjjaṁ ।
sō uḍḍō jassa vi dasaṁṇēṇa vaḍavā jalaṁ dēi ॥ 4 ॥

iya bāliyāi bhaṇiē vilakkhahasiraṁ hariṁ namaha ॥ 1 ॥

pāyaḍakaṇṭhaggahamaggirīu riṭṭhaṁ pasaṁsanti ॥ 2 ॥
kaṇhō jayaï juvāṇō rāhā ummattajōvvaṇā jayaï ।
jaüṇā bahulataraṅgā tē diyahā tēttiya1 ccēva ॥ 3 ॥
tihuyaṇaṇamiō vi harī nivaḍaï gōvāliyāi calaṇēsu ।
saccaṁ ciya nēhaṇirandhalēhi dōsā na dīsanti ॥ 4 ॥
kaṇhō kaṇhō nisi candavajjiyā nibiḍavēḍisā jaüṇā ।
bhamarī hōhisi jaï, lahasi putti vayaṇassa gandhēṇa ॥ 5 ॥
kēsiviyāraṇaruhirullakupparugdhasaṇalañchaṇagdhaviyaṁ ।
na muēi kaṇha juṇṇaṁ pi kañcuyaṁ ajja vi visāhā ॥ 6 ॥
rāhāi kavōlatalucchalantajōṇhāṇivāyadhavalaṅgō ।
raïrahasavāvaḍāē dhavalō āliṅgiō kaṇhō ॥ 7 ॥
dhavalaṁ dhavalacchīē mahuraṁ mahurāurīi majjhammi ।
takkaṁ vikkantīē kaṇhō kaṇhō tti vāhariō ॥ 8 ॥
saccaṁ cēya bhuyaṅgī visāhiyā kaṇha taṇhahā hōi ।
santē vi viṇayataṇaē jīē dhummāviō taṁ si ॥ 9 ॥

jēṇaṁ visāhiyāē bhamasi sayā hatthalaggāē ॥ 10 ॥
kisiō si kīsa kēsava kiṁ na kaō dhannasaṅgahō mūḍha ।
kattō maṇapariōsō visāhiyaṁ bhuñjamāṇassa ॥ 11 ॥
vihaḍaü maṇḍilavandhō bhajjaü rāsō na muccaē kaṇha ।
navasiyasaēhi laddhō tuha hatthō majjha hatthēṇa ॥ 12 ॥
kaṇhō dēvō dēvā vi pattharā suyaṇu nimmavijjanti ।

khaṇḍanti na sappurisā paṇayaparūḍhāi pēmmāiṁ ॥ 14 ॥
saccaṁ ciya cavaï jaṇō amuṇiyaparamattha nandagōvālō ।

candāhayapaḍibimbāi2 jāi mukkaṭṭahāsabhīyāē ।

tā kīsa muddhaḍamuhī hasiūṇa parammuhī ṭhāi ॥ 5 ॥

sayaṇammi nāvagūhaï ramaṇaṁ bhaṇa kēṇa kajjēṇa ॥ 8 ॥
sālattayaṁ payaṁ ūruēsu taha kajjalaṁ ca calaṇēsu ।

bahukūḍakavaḍabhariyā māyārūvēṇa rañjaē hiyayaṁ ।

ghēppaï macchāṇa paē āyāsē pakkhiṇō ya payamaggō ।

aïṇiuṇō navari vihī sitthaṁ pi na baḍḍhiuṁ dēi ॥ 3 ॥
jaṁ ciya vihiṇā lihiyaṁ taṁ ciya pariṇamaï sayalalōyassa ।
iya jāṇiūṇa dhīrā vihurē vi na kāyarā hunti ॥ 4 ॥
pāvijjaï jattha suhaṁ pāvijjaï maraṇabandhaṇaṁ jattha ।
tēṇa tahiṁ ciya nijjaï niyakammagalatthiō jīvō ॥ 5 ॥
tā kiṁ bhaēṇa kiṁ cintiēṇa kiṁ jūriēṇa bahuēṇa ।
jaï sō ccēva viyambhaï puvvakaō puṇṇapariṇāmō ॥ 6 ॥
kō dāūṇa samatthō kō vā hariūṇa jassa jaṁ vihiyaṁ ।
pariṇamaï phalaṁ puttaya puvvakkammāṇusārēṇa ॥ 7 ॥
rāyaṅgaṇammi parisaṇṭhiyassa jaha kuñjarassa māhappaṁ ।
viñjhasiharammi na tahā ṭhāṇēsu guṇā visaṭṭanti1 ॥ 1 ॥
ajjhākavōlaparisaṇṭhiyassa jaha candaṇassa māhappaṁ ।

dīvasiharē vi na tahā ṭhāṇēsu guṇā visaṭṭanti ॥ 3 ॥
kēsāṇa dantaṇahaṭhakkurāṇa vahuyāṇa vahuyaṇē taha ya ।
thaṇayāṇa ṭhāṇacukkāṇa māmi kō āyaraṁ kuṇaï ॥ 4 ॥
ṭhāṇaṁ na muyaï dhīrō ṭhakkurasaṅghassa duṭṭhavaggassa ।
ṭhantaṁ pi1 dēi jujjhaṁ ṭhāṇē ṭhāṇē jasaṁ lahaï ॥ 5 ॥
gahiyavimukkā tēyaṁ jaṇanti2 sāmāiṇō narindāṇaṁ ।

uyahivaḍavāṇalāṇaṁ parōpparulhavaṇasōsaṇamaṇāṇaṁ ।
amuṇiyamajjhapajalaṇāṇa vaïyarō jiṇaï jiyalōē ॥ 7 ॥
jaï natthi guṇā tā kiṁ kulēṇa guṇiṇō kulēṇa na hu kajjaṁ ।
kulamakalaṅkaṁ guṇavajjiyāṇa garuyaṁ ciya kalaṅkaṁ ॥ 1 ॥
guṇahīṇā jē purisā kulēṇa gavvaṁ vahanti tē mūḍhā ।
vaṁsuppannō vi dhaṇū guṇarahiē natthi ṭaṅkārō ॥ 2 ॥
jammantaraṁ na garuyaṁ garuyaṁ purisassa guṇagaṇāruhaṇaṁ ।
muttāhalaṁ hi garuyaṁ na hu garuyaṁ sippisampuḍayaṁ ॥ 3 ॥
kharapharusaṁ sippiuḍaṁ rayaṇaṁ taṁ hōi jaṁ aṇagghēyaṁ ।
jāīi kiṁ va kijjaï guṇēhi dōsā phusijjanti ॥ 4 ॥
jaṁ jāṇaï bhaṇaï jaṇō guṇāṇa vihavāṇa antaraṁ garuyaṁ ।
labbhaï guṇēhi vihavō vihavēhi guṇā na ghēppanti ॥ 5 ॥
ṭhāṇaṁ guṇēhi labbhaï tā guṇagahaṇaṁ avassa kāyavvaṁ ।
hārō vi nēya pāvaï guṇarahiō taruṇithaṇavaṭṭaṁ ॥ 6 ॥
pāsaparisaṇṭhiō vi hu guṇahīṇē kiṁ karēi guṇavantō ।
jāyandhayassa dīvō hatthakaō nipphalō ccēya ॥ 7 ॥
paralōyagayāṇaṁ pi hu pacchattāō na tāṇa purisāṇaṁ ।

muttāhalaṁ va pahuṇō guṇiṇō kiṁ karaï vēharahiyassa ।
jattha na pavisaï sūī tattha guṇā bāhira ccēya ॥ 1 ॥
piyakēlisaṅgamōsāriēṇa hārēṇa cintiyaṁ ēyaṁ ।
avasararahiyā guṇavantayā vi dūrē dharijjanti ॥ 2 ॥
tā nigguṇa cciya varaṁ pahuṇavalambhēṇa jāṇa pariōsō ।

nigguṇa guṇēhi niyaṇigguṇattaṇaṁ dēhi amha saḍḍhīē ।

tā kiṁ sahanti guṇiṇō aṇāyaraṁ atthavantāṇaṁ ॥ 5 ॥
jassa na gēṇhanti guṇā suyaṇā gōṭṭhīsu raṇamuhē suhaḍā ।
niyajaṇaṇijōvvaṇullaraṇēṇa kiṁ tēṇa jāēṇa ॥ 1 ॥
kiṁ tēṇa jāiēṇa vi purisēm̐ payapūraṇē vi asamatthēm̐ ।
jēṇa na jasēṇa bhariyaṁ sari vva bhuvaṇantaraṁ sayalaṁ ॥ 2 ॥
dēsē gāmē nayarē rāyapahē tiyacaükkamaggē vā ।
jassa na pasaraï kittī dhiratthu kiṁ tēṇa jāēṇa ॥ 3 ॥
kiṁ tēṇa āiēṇa va kiṁ vā pasayacchi tēṇa va gaēṇa ।
jassa kaē raṇaraṇayaṁ nayarē na gharāgharaṁ hōi ॥ 4 ॥
uḍḍhaṁ vaccanti ahō vayanti mūlaṅkura vva bhuvaṇammi ।
vijjāhiyaē kattō kulāhi purisā samuppannā ॥ 1 ॥
niyakammēhi vi nīyaṁ uccaṁ purisā lahanti saṇṭhāṇaṁ ।
suramandirakūvayarā uḍḍhaddhamuhā ya vaccanti ॥ 2 ॥
ēkkammi kulē ēkkammi mandirē ēkkakukkhisambhūyā ।
ēkkō narasayasāmī annō ēkkassa asamatthō ॥ 3 ॥
sajjaṇasalāhaṇijjē payammi appā na ṭhāviō jēhiṁ ।
susamatthā jē na parōvayāriṇō tēhi vi na kiṁ pi2 ॥ 4 ॥
hiṭṭhakayakaṇṭayāṇaṁ payaḍiyakōsāṇa mittasamuhāṇaṁ ।

ēvaṁvihē vasantī kamalē kamalē kayatthā si ॥ 3 ॥
jaḍasaṁvāhiyapharusattaṇassa niṇhaviyaṇiyaguṇōhassa ।

tā sundaraṁ na hōhī tujjha phalaṁ kālapariṇāmē ॥ 1 ॥
appaṁ2 paraṁ na yāṇasi nūṇaṁ saüṇō si lacchipariyariō ।
ujjalasamuhō pēcchaha tā vayaṇaṁ pi hu na ṭhāvēi ॥ 2 ॥
lacchīē parigahiyā uḍḍhamuhā jaï na hunti tā pēccha ।
jēhiṁ ciya uḍḍhaviyā taṁ ciya nālaṁ na pēcchanti ॥ 3 ॥
lacchiṇilayattaṇuttāṇavayaṇa guṇiṇō sayāṇulaggassa ।
niyaṇālassa vi vimuhō tā paṅkaya kassa samuhō si ॥ 4 ॥
vaḍḍhāviyakōsō jaṁ si kamala parisōsiēhi pattēhiṁ ।
acchaü tā lacchivaō taṁ ciya nāmaṁ pi hārihisi ॥ 5 ॥
mittō sūrō kayapattapariyarō lacchiyālaō kamalō ।
payahīṇassa sahārō kēṇāvi na sakkiō nimisaṁ ॥ 6 ॥
sarasāṇa sūrapariṁsaṇṭhiyāṇa kamalāṇa kīsa uvayārō ।

chaṇḍijjaï haṁsa saraṁ kattō vāsō parammuhē divvē ।
jāva na ṭhavēi calaṇē kūḍabaō matthaē ēṇhiṁ ॥ 1 ॥
paḍhamaṁ ciya jē vigayā ghaṇāgamē sāhu tāṇa haṁsāṇaṁ ।
jēhi na diṭṭhaṁ uccāsaṇaṭṭhiyaṁ khalabayakuḍumbaṁ ॥ 2 ॥
iyaravihaṅgamapayapanticittalā jattha puliṇapērantā ।
tattha sarē na hu juttaṁ vasiyavvaṁ rāyahaṁsāṇaṁ ॥ 3 ॥
vivihavihaṅgamaṇivahēṇa maṇḍiyaṁ pēcchiūṇa kamalavaṇaṁ ।
mukkaṁ māṇabbhariēhi māṇasaṁ rāyahaṁsēhiṁ ॥ 4 ॥
addhatthamiē surē jaṁ dukkhaṁ hōi cakkavāyassa ।
taṁ hōu tuha riūṇaṁ ahavā tāṇaṁ pi mā hōu ॥ 1 ॥
bhūmīgayaṁ na cattā sūraṁ daṭaṭhūṇa cakkavāēṇa ।
jīyaggala vva dinnā muṇāliyā virahabhīēṇa ॥ 2 ॥
aggi vva paümasaṇḍaṁ ciya vva naliṇī maḍō vva appā ṇaṁ ।

āsāsijjaï cakkō jalagayapaḍibimbadaṁsaṇāsāē ।
taṁ pi haranti taraṅgā pēcchaha niuṇṇattaṇaṁ vihiṇō ॥ 4 ॥
āsanti saṅgamāsā gamanti rayaṇiṁ suhēṇa cakkāyā ।
diyahā na ya hunti viōyakāyarā kaha nu vōlanti ॥ 5 ॥
aliyaṁ jampēi jaṇō jaṁ pēmmaṁ hōi atthalōhēṇa ।
sēvālajīviyāṇaṁ kaō dhaṇaṁ cakkavāyāṇaṁ ॥ 6 ॥
susiēṇa nihasiēṇa vi taha kaha vi hu candaṇēṇa mahamahiyaṁ ।
sarasā vi kusumamālā jaha jāyā parimalavilakkhā ॥ 1 ॥
parasucchēyapaharaṇēṇa nihasaṇēm̐ nēya ujjhiyā payaī ।
candaṇa saṁnayasīsō tēṇa tumaṁ vandaē lōō ॥ 2 ॥
uttamakulēsu jammaṁ tuha candaṇa taruvarāṇa majjhammi ।
dujjīhāṇa khalāṇa ya niccaṁ ciya tēṇa aṇurattō ॥ 3 ॥
ēkkō ciya dōsō tārisassa candaṇadumassa vihighaḍiō ।
jīsē duṭṭhabhuyaṅgā khaṇaṁ pi pāsaṁ na mēllanti ॥ 4 ॥
bahutaruvarāṇa majjhē candaṇaviḍavō bhuyaṅgadōsēṇa ।
chijjaï nirāvarāhō sāhu vva asāhusaṅgēṇa ॥ 5 ॥
jāō si kīsa panthē ahavā jāō si kīsa phaliō si ।
aha phaliō si mahāduma tā saüṇabiḍambaṇaṁ sahasu ॥ 1 ॥
nīrasa-karīra-kharakhaïrasaṅkulē visamasamimaruddēsē ।
kā hōjja gaī pahiyāṇa jaṁ si vaḍapāyava na hōntō ॥ 2 ॥
bhūmīguṇēṇa vaḍapāyavassa jaï tuṅgimā ihaṁ hōi ।
taha vi hu phalāṇa riddhī hōsaï bīyāṇusārēṇa ॥ 3 ॥
kiṁ tāla tujjha tuṅgattaṇēṇa gayaṇaddharuddhamaggēṇa ।
chuhajalaṇatāviēhi vi uvahēppasi jaṁ na pahiēhiṁ ॥ 1 ॥
chāyārahiyassa nirāsayassa dūrayaradāviyaphalassa ।
dōsēhi samā jā kā vi tuṅgimā tujjha rē tāla ॥ 2 ॥
jēhiṁ nīō vaḍḍhiṁ tālō sayasaliladāṇasēvāē ।
tassēva jō na phaliō sō phaliō kaha nu annassa ॥ 3 ॥
maülantassa ya mukkā tujjha palāsā palāsa saüṇēhiṁ ।
jēṇa mahumāsasamaē niyavayaṇaṁ jhatti sāmaliyaṁ ॥ 1 ॥
acchaü tā phalaṇivahaṁ phullaṇadiyahammi kalusiyaṁ vayaṇaṁ ।
iya kaliūṇa palāsō jhaḍa tti mukkō sapattēhiṁ ॥ 2 ॥
daṭṭhūṇa kiṁsuyā sāhā taṁ bālāi kīsa vēlaviō ।
ahavā na tujjha dōsō kō na hu chaliō palāsēhiṁ ॥ 3 ॥
guruvihavavittharutthambhirē vi kiviṇammi atthiṇō vihalā ।
bhaṇa phaliē vi palāsē maṇōrahā kassa jāyanti ॥ 4 ॥
saccaṁ palāsa jaṁ phulliō si phaliō si rahaṇiuñjēsu ।
jaï hōjja sukhajjaphalō maṇaṁ pi tā tujjha kō mullō ॥ 5 ॥
sōsaṇamaī u nivasasu vaḍavāṇala muṇaï jāva na samuddō ।
jāva ya jāṇihii phuḍaṁ tā na tumaṁ nēya bhuvaṇayalaṁ ॥ 1 ॥
kā samasīsī tiyasindayāṇa vaḍavāṇalassa sarisammi ।
uvasamiyasihippasarō mayaraharō indhaṇaṁ jassa ॥ 2 ॥
rayaṇāyarēṇa rayaṇaṁ parimukkaṁ jaï vi amuṇiyaguṇēṇa ।
taha vi hu maragayakhaṇḍaṁ jattha gayaṁ tattha vi mahagdhaṁ ॥ 1 ॥
jalaṇihimukkēṇa vi kutthuhēṇa pattaṁ murārivacchayalaṁ ।
tēṇa puṇa tassa ṭhāṇē na yāṇimō kō pariṭṭhaviō ॥ 2 ॥
mā dōsaṁ ciya gēṇhaha viralē vi guṇē pasaṁsaha jaṇassa ।
akkhapaürō vi uvahī bhaṇṇaï rayaṇāyarō lōē ॥ 3 ॥
vēlāmahallakallōlapēlliyaṁ jaï vi giriṇaïṁ pattaṁ ।
aṇusaraï maggalaggaṁ puṇō vi rayaṇāyarē rayaṇaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
lacchīi viṇā rayaṇāyarassa gambhīrimā taha ccēva ।
sā lacchī tēṇa viṇā bhaṇa kassa na mandiraṁ pattā ॥ 5 ॥
vaḍavāṇalēṇa gahiō mahiō ya surāsurēhi sayalēhiṁ ।
lacchīi uvahi mukkō pēcchaï gambhīrimā tassa ॥ 6 ॥
jalaṇaṁ jalaṁ ca, amiyaṁ, visaṁ ca, kaṇhō sadāṇavō ccēva ।
khīrōyahi tujjha tahā paramahimā ahiyaahiyayarō ॥ 7 ॥

kariṇō muttāhalasaṁsaē vi mayavibbhalā1 diṭṭhī ॥ 8 ॥
aṇavarayaṁ dēntassa vi tuṭṭanti na sāyarē vi rayaṇāiṁ ।
puṇṇakkhaēṇa khijjaï na hu lacchī cāyabhōēhiṁ ॥ 9 ॥
rayaṇāyarassa na hu hōi tucchimā niggaēhi rayaṇēhiṁ ।
taha vi hu candasaricchā viralā rayaṇāyarē rayaṇā ॥ 10 ॥
rayaṇāyaracattēṇa vi pattaṁ candēṇa haraha tilayattaṁ ।
tēṇa uṇa tassa ṭhāṇē na yāṇimō kō piriṭṭhaviō ॥ 11 ॥
jaï vi hu kālavasēṇaṁ sasī samuddāu kaha vi vicchuḍiō ।
taha vi hu tassa payāvaṁ ( ? payāsō ) āṇandaṁ kuṇaï dūrē vi ॥ 12 ॥
rayaṇāi surāṇa samappiūṇa vaḍavāṇalassa chuhiyassa ।
appā ( ? appaṁ ) dēntēṇa taē samudda muddaṅkiyaṁ bhuvaṇaṁ ॥ 13 ॥

sāhīṇāmayarayaṇō amaramarōraṁ ca bhuvaṇamakarantō ।

jīsē gimhapivāsā valanti vi parammuhā pahiyā ॥ 3 ॥
sāyara lajjāi kahaṁ na muō cintāi kaha na vīsannō ।
paï huntē bōhitthiyahi kaō jalasaṅgahō annō ॥ 4 ॥
