dinnā puṇō vi dijjaü rēhā chēyattaṇammi kaṇhassa ।
jō ramaï gōvisatthaṁ hiyayaṇihittāi lacchīē ॥ 7 ॥
hiyaē jaṁ ca nihittaṁ taṁ pi hu jāṇanti buddhīē ।
mā putti vaṅkabandhaṁ jampasi puraō chaïllāṇaṁ ॥ 8 ॥1
dhaṇu sandhaï bhuyavalayaṁ2 āyaḍḍhaï nayaṇabāṇa kaṇṇantā ।
vindhaï maṇaṁ na jīyaṁ aüvvadhāṇukkiṇī bālā ॥ 1 ॥
pāmaravahuyāi savammahāṇa nayaṇāṇa rakkhasāṇaṁ va ।
sāsaṅkō bhamaï jaṇō jōyaï maggaṁ pulōyantō ॥ 2 ॥
ajjaṁ vi ya tēṇa viṇā imīi ēyāi kasiṇadhavalāiṁ ।
jaccandhagōruyāi va disāsu ghōlanti nayaṇāiṁ ॥ 3 ॥2
siyakasiṇadīharujjalapamhalaghōlantatāraṇayaṇāṇaṁ ।
taruṇāṇa mā hu hayavihi diṭṭhīpasaraṁ pi bhañjihisi ॥ 4 ॥
rattaṁ rattēhi siyaṁ siēhi kasiṇaṁ kuṇanti kasiṇēhiṁ ।
siyakasiṇacchīhi taē mayacchi rattō jaṇō cōjjaṁ ॥ 5 ॥
gāḍhayaracumbaṇupphusiyabahalaṇīlañjaṇāi rēhanti ।
bapphabhbhintarapasariyagalantabāhāhi acchīiṁ ॥ 6 ॥
na maē ruṇṇaṁ na kayamamaṅgalaṁ hōntu sayalasiddhīō ।
virahaggidhūmakaḍuyāviyāi pagalanti nayaṇāiṁ ॥ 7 ॥1
nahakuntaggayabhinnā hārāvalisuttamaṇḍalaggaṭhiyā ।
rēhanti surayarajjāhisēyakalasa vva sē thaṇayā ॥ 1 ॥
sō taṇhāiyapahiya vva dūmiō tīi diṭṭhamēttēhiṁ ।
panthapavākalasēhi va thaṇēhi ummanthiyamuhēhiṁ ॥ 2 ॥
thaṇakaṇayakalasajuyalaṁ rōmāvalilōhasaṅkalābaddhaṁ ।
kassa kaē ṇaṁ bālā rayaṇaṇihāṇaṁ samuvvahaï ॥ 3 ॥
aṇurāyarayaṇabhariyaṁ kañcaṇakalasammi1 taruṇithaṇajuyalaṁ ।
tā kiṁ muhammi kālaṁ masimuddā mayaṇarāyassa ॥ 4 ॥
ṭhāṇaccuyāṇa sundari maṇḍalarahiyāṇa vihavacattāṇaṁ ।
thaṇayāṇa supurisāṇa ya kō hatthaṁ dēi paḍiyāṇaṁ ॥ 5 ॥2
nahakuntaggayabhinnā samuhāgayakumbhapīlaṇasamatthā ।
thaṇayā nivvūḍhabharā bhaḍu vva paḍiyā vi sōhanti ॥ 6 ॥
āsannapaḍaṇabhayabhīruēhi jamalēhi sāmalamuhēhiṁ ।
duddhaṁsuēhi ruṇṇaṁ thaṇēhi ṭhāṇaṁ muyantēhiṁ ।
aliyā khala vva ku़ḍilā majjhaṁsē kiviṇadāṇasāricchā ।
thaṇayā unnayacintiya na tīi hiyaē na māyanti ॥ 8 ॥1
thaṇahāraṁ tīi samunnayaṁ pi daṭūṭhūṇa tārisaṁ paḍiyaṁ ।
mā kuṇaü kō vi gavvaṁ ēttha asārammi saṁsārē ॥ 9 ॥2
uccaṭṭhāṇā vi susaṅgayā vi sampuṇṇayā vi tuha thaṇayā ।
taruṇamaṇarayaṇasāraṁ haranti jaṁ taṁ mahacchariyaṁ ॥ 10 ॥
ṭhāṇayarēhiṁ ēhiṁ ahōmuhēhiṁ aṇavarayapōḍhēhiṁ ।
sihiṇēhi narindēhi va kiṁ kijjaï payavimukkēhiṁ ॥ 11 ॥
iha tivaliramaṇē/?/ iha vayaṇakamalē/?/ iha kaḍhiṇaviulathaṇavaṭṭē ।
ajjhāē lāvaṇṇaṁ phaliyaṁ piva ḍhuṅgaḍhuṅgēhiṁ ॥ 1 ॥
annannā mēhalayā annannō kañcuō navavahūē ।
parihēuṁ na samappaï samāruhantammi tāruṇṇē ॥ 2 ॥
antōkaḍhanta mayaṇaggitāviyaṁ vahaï kaṇayakantillaṁ ।
bālāē lāvaṇṇaṁ upphiṇiyaṁ thaṇabharamisēṇa ॥ 3 ॥
sahasa tti jaṁ na bhajjaï thaṇaharabhārēṇa majjhataṇuyaṅgī ।
bhañjaṇabhaēṇa vihiṇā dinnō rōmāvalīkhabhō ॥ 4 ॥
bālākavōlalāvaṇṇaṇijjiō canda khijjasē kīsa ।
aha māṇō na hu kīraü bahurayaṇavibhūsiyā puhavī ॥ 5 ॥
bālā lāvaṇṇaṇihī navallavalli vva māuliṅgassa ।
ciñci vva dūrapakkā karēi lālāuyaṁ hiyayaṁ ॥ 6 ॥
annōnnaṇēhaṇijjhara/?/viiṇṇahiyayāṇa aliyakuviyāṇaṁ ।
pattiyajaṇāṇa suraē jaṁ sōkkhaṁ taṁ phuḍaṁ amayaṁ ॥ 1 ॥
surayāvasāṇasamaē maüliyaṇayaṇāṇaṇā ya bimbōṭṭhī ।
alahantī surayasuhaṁ pāsatthamuhī piyaṁ bhaṇaï ॥ 2 ॥
surayappasutta kōvaṇa appambhara mā hu rē nivajjihisi ।
kayakajja kiṁ na yāṇasi asamattarayāṇa jaṁ dukkhaṁ ॥ 3 ॥
calavalayamēhalaravaṁ kalakaliramaṇōharaṁ ca sōūṇa ।
īsā rōsō mahilattaṇaṁ ca mukkaṁ savattīhiṁ ॥ 4 ॥
bālā asamattarayā rayāvasāṇammi paharisī bhaṇaï ।
kiṁ suyasi nāha, haṁ 1suyami, kiṁ nu pajjattakajjō si ॥ 5 ॥
paḍhamārambhamaṇaharaṁ ghaṇalaggaṁ māṇarāyaramaṇijjaṁ ।
pēmmaṁ surindacāvaṁ va cañcalaṁ jhatti vōlēi ॥ 1 ॥
khaṇabhaṅgurēṇa visamēṇa hāriṇā duṇṇivārapasarēṇa ।
aṇavaṭṭhiyasabbhāvēṇa savvahā hōu pēmmēṇa ॥ 2 ॥
jaï dēva maha pasannō mā jammaṁ dēhi māṇusē lōē ।
aha jammaṁ mā pēmmaṁ, aha pēmmaṁ mā viōyaṁ ca ॥ 3 ॥
annaṁ taṁ sayadaliyaṁ pi milaï rasagōliya vva jaṁ pēmmaṁ ।
amhaṁ mayacchi muttāhalaṁ va phuṭṭaṁ na saṅghaḍaï ॥ 4 ॥
daḍhaṇēhaṇālapasariyasabbhāvadalassa raïsuyandhassa ।
pēmmuppalassa muddhē māṇatusārō cciya viṇāsō ॥ 5 ॥1
avvō jāṇāmi ahaṁ pēmmaṁ ca ivēi lōyamajjhammi ।
thiraāsāē raïyaṁ na pīḍiyaṁ navari divvēṇa ॥ 6 ॥2
jā na calaï tā amayaṁ caliyaṁ pēmmaṁ visaṁ visēsēi ।
diṭṭhaṁ suyaṁ va kattha vi mayacchi visagabbhiṇaṁ amayaṁ ॥ 7 ॥
bhaggaṁ na jāi ghaḍiuṁ dujjaṇahiyayaṁ kulālabhaṇḍaṁ va ।
sayakhaṇḍaṁ pi ghaḍijjaï kañcaṇakalasō suyaṇacittaṁ ॥ 8 ॥
bhaggaṁ puṇō ghaḍijjaï kaṇayaṁ kaṅkaṇayaṇēuraṁ nayaraṁ ।
puṇa bhaggaṁ na ghaḍijjaï pēmmaṁ muttāhalaṁ jaccaṁ ॥ 9 ॥
sō kō vi na dīsaï sāmalaṅgi jō ghaḍaï vighaḍiyaṁ pēmmaṁ ।
ghaḍakapparaṁ ca bhaggaṁ na ēi tēhiṁ ciya salēhiṁ ॥ 10 ॥1
dantē tiṇāi kaṇṭhē kuvārayaṁ sundaraṁ ca tuha ēyaṁ ।
māṇamaḍappharaṇaḍiē tuha māṇō kēṇa niddiṭṭhō ॥ 1 ॥
ēmēva kaha vi mā ṇaṁsiṇīi taha mahamahāviō māṇō ।
jaha khēmakusalasambhāsabhētta sō piō jāō ॥ 2 ॥
vāsārattē pāvāsiyāṇa virahaggitāvataviyāṇaṁ ।
aṅgēsu laggamāṇō paḍhamāsārō chamacchamaï ॥ 1 ॥
jēhiṁ sōhaggaṇihī diṭṭhō nayaṇēhi tē cciya ruyantu ।
aṅgāi apāviyasaṅgamāi tā kīsa khijjanti ॥ 1 ॥
tuha surayapavaratarupallavaggakavalāṇa laddhamāhappō ।
maha maṇakarahō muddhē dakkhākabalaṁ pi pariharaï ॥ 2 ॥
virahaggijalaṇajālākarāliyaṁ kuvalayacchi maha aṅgaṁ ।
tuha ramaṇamahāṇaïpāṇiēṇa muddhē pavijjhāhi ॥ 3 ॥
rēhaï piyapaḍirumbhaṇa1 pasāriyaṁ surayamandiraddārē ।
hēlāhallāviyathōrathaṇaharaṁ bhuyalayājuyalaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
tā jāi tā niyattaï ṭhāṇaṁ gantūṇa jhatti vāhuḍaï ।
piyavirahō ghōḍā viggahō vva hiyaē na saṇṭhāi ॥ 5 ॥
na jalanti na dhagadhaganti na simasimanti na muyanti dhūmavattīō ।
aṅgāi aṇaṅgaparavvasāi ēmēva ḍajjhanti ॥ 6 ॥
vaḍḍhasi virahē hassasi samāgamē hā nisē nisaṁsā si ।
bhaddē tumaṁ pi mahilā taha vi hu dukkhaṁ na yāṇāsi ॥ 7 ॥
tā kiṁ karēmi māē nijjiyarūvassa kāmadēvassa ।
daḍḍhaṁ pi ḍahaï aṅgaṁ niddhūmō saṅkhacuṇṇu vva ॥ 1 ॥
hārēṇa māmi kusumacchaḍāyaluppannacicciṇā daḍḍhō ।
vammīsaṇō na mannaï ulūviō tēṇa maṁ ḍahaï ॥ 2 ॥
jē kē vi rasā diṭṭhīu jāu jē bharahabhāviyā bhāvā ।
tē naccijjanti aṇacciyā vi sahasā piē diṭṭhē ॥ 1 ॥
sō kattha gaō sō suyaṇavallahō sō suhāsiyasamuddō ।
sō mayaṇaggiviṇāsō jō sō sōsēi maha hiyayaṁ1 ॥ 2 ॥
sō māsō taṁ pi diṇaṁ sā rāī savvalakkhaṇasaüṇṇā ।
amayaṁ va taṁ muhuttaṁ jattha piō jhatti dīsihii2 ॥ 3 ॥
hiyayaṭṭhiō vi piō taha vi hu nayaṇāṇa hōi duppēcchō ।
pēcchaha vihiṇā na kayā maha uyarē jālayagavakkhā ॥ 4 ॥1
hōhī taṁ kiṁ pi diṇaṁ jattha piō bāhupañjaraṇibaddhō ।
vittē surayapasaṅgē pucchihii pavāsadukkhāiṁ2 ॥ 5 ॥
dinnaṁ gēṇhaï, appēi patthiyaṁ, asaï, bhōyaṇaṁ dēi ।
akkhaï gujjhaṁ pucchēi paḍivayaṁ jāṇa taṁ rattaṁ ॥ 6 ॥
ahavā tujjha na dōsō tassa u rūvassa hiyakilēsassa ।
ajjāvi na ppasīyaï īsāyanti vva giritaṇayā3 ॥ 1 ॥
kassa kahijjanti phuḍaṁ dūhaviṇaṭṭhāi sahi kajjāiṁ ।
ahavā lōyapasiddhaṁ na phalanti samakkaḍārāmā ॥ 2 ॥
sā diyahaṁ ciya pēcchaï nayaṇā paḍiyāi dappaṇatalammi ।
ēēhi tumaṁ diṭṭhō si suhaya dōhiṁ pi acchīhiṁ ॥ 1 ॥
dukkhēhi vi tuha virahē bālaya dukkhaṁ ṭhiyaṁ, aha ccāē ।
aṁsūjalēhi rūṇṇaṁ nīsāsēhiṁ pi nīsasiyaṁ ॥ 2 ॥
bālaya nāhaṁ dūī tīi piō si tti namha vāvārō ।
sā maraï tujjha aasō tti tēṇa dhammakkharaṁ bhaṇimō1 ॥ 3 ॥
sā suhaya sāmalaṅgī jā sā nīsāsasōsiyasarīrā ।
āsāsijjaï1 sahasā jāva na sāsā samappanti2 ॥ 4 ॥
parapurapavēsavinnāṇalāhavaṁ suhaya sikkhiyaṁ kattha ।
jēṇa paviṭṭhō hiyaē paḍhama cciya daṁsaṇē majjha ॥ 5 ॥
uddhacchō piyaï jalaṁ jaha jaha viralaṅgulī ciraṁ pahiō ।
pāvāliyā vi taha taha dhāraṁ taṇuyaṁ pi taṇuēi ॥ 1 ॥
ahiṇavagajjiyasaddaṁ mōrāṇa ya kalayalaṁ nisāmantō ।
mā pavasa dhiṭṭha panthiya, marihisi, kiṁ tē paütthēṇa ॥ 2 ॥
vāsārattē vāuddhuēṇa vāsaṁ vimaggamāṇēṇa ।
pahiēṇa pahiyaghariṇō ruyāviyā tharaharantēṇa ॥ 3 ॥
sihiraḍiyaṁ ghaṇaraḍiyaṁ dūraṁ pi gharaṁ ghaṇatthaṇaṁ ramaṇiṁ ।
sambhariūṇa saēsaṁ pahiēṇa ghaṇagghaṇaṁ rūṇṇaṁ ॥ 4 ॥
taï vōlantē bālaya tissā valiyāi taha nu aṅgāiṁ ।
jaha paṭṭhimajjhaṇivaḍantavāhadhārā va dīsanti ॥ 5 ॥
iya taruṇitaruṇasambharaṇakāraṇaṁ turagataraṇaraṇucchaliyaṁ ।
raïyaṁ iya varakulayaṁ pāiyasīlēṇa līlēṇa ॥ 1 ॥
hē hiyaya avvavaṭṭhiya agaṇijjantō vi taṁ jaṇaṁ mahasi ।
kandu vva silāvaḍiyaṁ aladdhapasaraṁ niyattihisi ॥ 1 ॥
sātammi hiyaya dulahammi māṇusē aliyasaṅgamāsāē ।
hariṇa vva mūḍha mayataṇhiyāi dūraṁ harijjihisi ॥ 2 ॥
nayaṇāi nayanti nayantu, hiyaya kō ēttha tujjha vāvārō ।
hōhinti imāi taḍē tuha paḍihii vammahacaḍakkā ॥ 3 ॥
nayaṇāi phusasu mā ruyasu aṇudiṇaṁ, muyasu tassa aṇubandhaṁ ।
gāijjaï kiṁ mariūṇa pañcamaṁ muddha hariṇacchi ॥ 4 ॥
indīvaracchi sayavāravāriyā kīsa taṁ jaṇaṁ mahasi ।
jaï kaṇayamayacchuriyā tā kiṁ ghāijjaē appā ॥ 5 ॥
paragharagamaṇālasiṇī parapurisavilōyaṇē ya jaccandhā ।
paraālāvē bahirā gharassa lacchī, na sā ghariṇī ॥ 1 ॥
ajjēva piyapavāsō, asaī dūrē, viḍambaē mayaṇō ।
caraṇuggaō vi aggī kayā vi sīsaṁ samāruhaï ॥ 2 ॥
bhaddaṁ kulaṅgaṇāṇaṁ jāsiṁ maṇakamalakōsamaṇupattō ।
mayaṇabhamarō varāō vaccaï nihaṇaṁ tahiṁ cēva ॥ 1 ॥
sakulakalaṅkaṁ niyakantavañcaṇaṁ ajasapaḍahaṇigghōsō ।
sarisavamēttē ca suhē kō dūi viḍambaē appaṁ ॥ 2 ॥
jēṇa samaṁ sambandhō giṇhaha nāmaṁ puṇō puṇō tassa ।
pucchēi mittavaggaṁ bhaṇṇaï ēvaṁvihā rattā ॥ 1 ॥
asaī asamattarayā sayaḍaṁ daṭaṭhūṇa gāmamajjhammi ।
dhannā hu cakkaṇāhī niccaṁ akkhō hiō jissā ॥ 2 ॥
ḍimbhattaṇabhmi ḍimbhēhi rāmiyā jōvvaṇē juvāṇēhiṁ ।
thērī vi gayavaēhiṁ mayā vi asaī pisāēhiṁ ॥ 3 ॥
bhayavaṁ huyāsa ēkkamha dukkayaṁ khamasu jaṁ paī ramiō ।
nihaṇaï pāvaṁ jārāṇumaraṇakayaṇicchayā asaī ॥ 4 ॥
saṅkēyakuḍaṅgōḍḍīṇasaüṇakōlāhalaṁ suṇantīē ।
gharakammavāvaḍāē vahūi khijjanti aṅgāiṁ1 ॥ 5 ॥
jāraṭhṭhaviṇimmiyamēhalāvaliṁ jā na bandhaï nivambē ।
tāva cciya navakāmāliṇīi ramaṇaṁ va pajjhariyaṁ ॥ 6 ॥
jāramasāṇasamubbhavabhūīsuhaphaṁsasijjiraṅgīē ।
na samappaï navakāmāliṇīi uddhūlaṇārambhō ॥ 7 ॥
bahalē tamandhayārē ramiyapamukkāṇa sāsusuṇhāṇaṁ ।
samayaṁ ciya abbhiḍiyā dōṇhaṁ pi saraddahē hatthā ॥ 8 ॥
sampattiyā vi khajjaï pattacchēyabhmi, mābhi kō dōsō ।
niyayavaī vi ramijjaï parapurisavivajjiē gāmē ॥ 9 ॥
racchātulaggavaḍiō nālattō jaṁ jaṇassa bhīyāē ।
sō cēya virahaḍāhō ajja vi hiyaē chamacchamaï ॥ 10 ॥
acchīhi tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ maē vi hiyaēṇa tassa paḍivannaṁ ।
jā pattiyaṁ pi jāyaṁ ghuṇahuṇiyaṁ tā hayaggāmē ॥ 11 ॥
siñcantō vi miyaṅkō jōṇhāsalilēṇa paṅkayavaṇāiṁ ।
taha vi aṇiṭṭhayarō cciya, sakalaṅkō kassa paḍihāi ॥ 12 ॥
attā jāṇaï suṇhaṁ suṇhā jāṇēi attacariyāiṁ ।
vaccaü suhēṇa kālō mā phuṭṭaü billa billēṇa ॥ 13 ॥
paḍhamaṁ ciya maha rēhā asaīmajjhammi ubbhiō hatthō ।
saraṇāmi tujjha pāyā surasari dūyattaṇaṁ kuṇaï ॥ 14 ॥
sīsēṇa kaha na kīraï niumbaṇaṁ māmi tassa gaṇayassa ।
asamattasukkasaṅkamaṇavēyaṇājēṇa maha muṇiyā ॥ 1 ॥
dhuttīraēṇa dhammiya jō hōi caḍāviēṇa ēkkēṇa ।
sō kurayāṇa saēṇa vi na hōi liṅgassa pariōsō ॥ 1 ॥
dhammiya dhammō suvvaï dāṇēṇa tavēṇa titthajattāē ।
taruṇatarupallavullūraṇēṇa dhammō kahiṁ diṭṭhō ॥ 2 ॥
tōlijjanti na kēṇa vi savvaṅgāyāragōvaṇasamatthā ।
annaṁ uṇa hiyayatulāi diṭṭhaṁ ciya tulanti ॥ 1 ॥
pajjharaṇaṁ rōmañcō vayaṇē saccaṁ sayā mahādiṭṭhī ।
ēyaṁ puṇō vi sikkhasu muddhē atthakkavinnāṇaṁ ॥ 1 ॥
karaphaṁsamalaṇacumbaṇapīlaṇaṇihaṇāi harisavayaṇēhiṁ ।
attā māyandaṇihīṇa kiṁ pi kumarīu sikkhavaï ॥ 2 ॥
amuṇiyajammuppattī savvagayā bahubhuyaṅgaparimaliyā ।
mayaṇaviṇāsaṇasīlā harō vva vēsā suhaṁ dēu ॥ 1 ॥
savvaṅgarāgarattaṁ daṁsaï kaṇavīrakusumasāricchaṁ ।
gabbhē kaha vi na rattaṁ vēsāhiyayaṁ taha ccēva ॥ 2 ॥
uvvūḍhabhuvaṇabhārō vi kēsavō thaṇaharēṇa rāhāē ।
mālaïdala vva kaliō lahuijjaï kō na pēmmēṇa ॥ 1 ॥
taha ruṇṇaṁ tīi taḍaṭṭhiyāi rāhāi kaṇhavirahammi ।
jaha sē kajjalamaïlaṁ ajja vi jaüṇājalaṁ vahaï ॥ 2 ॥
chīē jīva na bhaṇiyaṁ pariyaṇamajjhammi pōḍhamahilāē ।
chōḍēi cihurabhāraṁ puṇa baddhaṁ kēṇa kajjēṇa ॥ 1 ॥
kulabāliyā pasūyā puttavaī surayakajjatattillā ।

kassa kaēṇa kisōyari varaṇayaraṁ vahasi uttamaṅgēṇaṁ ।
